text: the wonderfully lush morvern callar is pure punk existentialism , and ms. ramsay and her co-writer , liana dognini , have dramatized the alan warner novel , which itself felt like an answer to irvine welsh 's book trainspotting .

text: an admitted egomaniac , evans is no hollywood villain , and yet this grating showcase almost makes you wish he 'd gone the way of don simpson .

text: confessions may not be a straightforward bio , nor does it offer much in the way of barris ' motivations , but the film is an oddly fascinating depiction of an architect of pop culture .

text: the inherent limitations of using a video game as the source material movie are once again made all too clear in this schlocky horror\/action hybrid .

text: takes a simple premise and carries it to unexpected heights .

translation: Moore adalah seperti lembu progresif dalam kedai cina, seorang provokateur yang menabrak idea dan kumpulan kepentingan khas sambil menyatukan jenama liberalisme miliknya sendiri.
back_translation: Moore is like a progressive bull in a China shop, a provocateur who challenges ideas and special interest groups while promoting his own brand of liberalism.

text: the film reminds me of a vastly improved germanic version of my big fat greek wedding -- with better characters , some genuine quirkiness and at least a measure of style .

text: the star who helped give a spark to `` chasing amy '' and `` changing lanes '' falls flat as thinking man cia agent jack ryan in this summer 's new action film , `` the sum of all fears . ''

text: since dahmer resorts to standard slasher flick thrills when it should be most in the mind of the killer , it misses a major opportunity to be truly revelatory about his psyche .

back_translation: Although it is further from both films, anyone who has watched The Hunger or Cat People will find that there is not much new here, but Vincent Gallo's delightful performance elevates this tale of cannibalistic desires above the usual standard.

text: the beautifully choreographed kitchen ballet is simple but absorbing .

text: thirteen conversations about one thing lays out a narrative puzzle that interweaves individual stories , and , like a mobius strip , elliptically loops back to where it began .

text: storytelling feels slight .

text: witty , vibrant , and intelligent .

text: one senses in world traveler and in his earlier film that freundlich bears a grievous but obscure complaint against fathers , and circles it obsessively , without making contact .

back_translation: In his world travels and his first film, Freundlich seemed to carry a painful yet vague complaint towards his father, circling obsessively around it, without making any contact.

text: even though many of these guys are less than adorable -lrb- their lamentations are pretty much self-centered -rrb- , there 's something vital about the movie .

text: while it may not add up to the sum of its parts , holofcener 's film offers just enough insight to keep it from being simpleminded , and the ensemble cast is engaging enough to keep you from shifting in your chair too often .
translation: Walaupun ia mungkin tidak menambahkan jumlah komponennya, filem holofcener menawarkan wawasan yang cukup untuk mengelakkan daripada menjadi terlalu mudah difahami, dan barisan pelakonnya cukup menarik untuk mengelakkan anda terlalu kerap tertukar di kerusi anda.

translation: Dua tajuk terdahulu oleh Ratliff, Plutonium Circus dan Purgatory County, menunjukkan kecenderungan beliau terhadap konfigurasi yang sindiran, kontroversi, dan filem ini merupakan sebahagian daripada kanon yang halus tersebut.

text: unexpected moments of authentically impulsive humor are the hallmark of this bittersweet , uncommonly sincere movie that portrays the frank humanity of ... emotional recovery .

translation: Seperti isyarat asap, filem ini juga diwarnai dengan tema-tema kekeluargaan dan spiritualiti yang kuat dan menyentuh tanpa tergelincir kepada melodrama yang rendah.
back_translation: Like smoke signals, this film is also characterized by strong and touching themes of family and spirituality without slipping into low melodrama.

text: as with so many merchandised-to-the-max movies of this type , more time appears to have gone into recruiting the right bands for the playlist and the costuming of the stars than into the script , which has a handful of smart jokes and not much else .
translation: Seperti kebanyakan filem yang dipasarkan dengan sepenuhnya pada jenis ini, kelihatannya lebih banyak masa telah digunakan untuk mengambil band yang sesuai untuk senarai main dan pakaian bintang daripada skrip, yang hanya mempunyai beberapa jenaka pintar dan tidak banyak yang lain.
back_translation: Like most films marketed entirely on this genre, it seems that more time has been used to choose the right soundtrack for the main cast and star wardrobe rather than the script, which only has a few clever jokes and not much else.

text: the film 's images give a backbone to the company and provide an emotional edge to its ultimate demise .
translation: Gambar-gambar filem memberikan tulang belakang kepada syarikat dan memberikan kelebihan emocional kepada kejatuhan terakhirnya.

text: stuffed to the brim with ideas , american instigator michael moore 's film is a rambling examination of american gun culture that uses his usual modus operandi of crucifixion through juxtaposition .

back_translation: Filled with ideas, American provocateur filmmaker Michael Moore’s film is a convoluted examination of America’s gun culture using commonly deployed modus operandi of satire through juxtaposition.

text: the metaphors are provocative , but too often , the viewer is left puzzled by the mechanics of the delivery .

text: 4ever has the same sledgehammer appeal as pokemon videos , but it breathes more on the big screen and induces headaches more slowly .

text: fear permeates the whole of stortelling , todd solondz ' oftentimes funny , yet ultimately cowardly autocritique .
translation: Ketakutan meresap ke dalam keseluruhan cerita, kritik diri Todd Solondz yang kadang-kadang lucu, namun akhirnya pengecut.
back_translation: Fear seeps into the entire story, Todd Solondz's self-criticism that is sometimes funny, but ultimately cowardly.

text: falsehoods pile up , undermining the movie 's reality and stifling its creator 's comic voice .
translation: Fitnah bertimbun, merosakkan realiti filem dan menekan suara komik penciptanya.
back_translation: Rumors are rife, damaging the reality of films and suppressing the voices of their comic creators.

text: bland but harmless .
translation: hambar tetapi tidak berbahaya.
back_translation: Bland but not harmful.

text: like leafing through an album of photos accompanied by the sketchiest of captions .
translation: Seperti melayari halaman album foto yang disertai dengan kapsyen yang paling ringkas.
back_translation: Like navigating a page of photo albums accompanied by the briefest captions.

text: judd 's characters ought to pick up the durable best seller smart women , foolish choices for advice .
translation: Watak-watak Judd sepatutnya mengambil nasihat dari buku terlaris yang tahan lama, "Smart Women, Foolish Choices".
back_translation: The characters of Judd should take advice from the long-lasting bestseller, "Smart Women, Foolish Choices".

text: the criticism never rises above easy , cynical potshots at morally bankrupt characters ...
translation: kritikan itu tidak pernah melampaui ejekan mudah dan sinis terhadap watak-watak yang moralnya rapuh ...
back_translation: The criticism never goes beyond easy and sardonic mockery of characters with fragile morals...

text: adolescents will be adequately served by the movie 's sophomoric blend of shenanigans and slapstick , although the more lascivious-minded might be disappointed in the relative modesty of a movie that sports a ` topless tutorial service . '
translation: Remaja akan dilayan dengan baik oleh gabungan cerita lucu dan slapstik di filem ini, walaupun yang lebih berfikiran lucah mungkin akan kecewa dengan kesederhanaan filem yang menampilkan 'perkhidmatan tutorial tanpa baju'.
back_translation: Teenagers will be entertained by the combination of funny and slapstick stories in this film, although those with a more risqué mindset may be disappointed by the simplicity of the film featuring 'shirtless tutorial services'.

text: about the best thing you could say about narc is that it 's a rock-solid little genre picture .
translation: Hal terbaik yang boleh anda katakan tentang Narc adalah bahawa ia adalah gambar genre yang kukuh.
back_translation: The best thing you can say about Narc is that it is a solid genre film.

text: an unbelievably stupid film , though occasionally fun enough to make you forget its absurdity .
translation: Filem yang sungguh bodoh, walaupun kadang-kadang menyeronokkan sehingga membuat anda lupa tentang keabsurdannya.
back_translation: A truly stupid movie, although sometimes enjoyable enough to make you forget about its absurdity.

text: star\/producer salma hayek and director julie taymor have infused frida with a visual style unique and inherent to the titular character 's paintings and in the process created a masterful work of art of their own .
translation: Pemain bintang/penerbit Salma Hayek dan pengarah Julie Taymor telah menyulamkan gaya visual yang unik dan tersendiri kepada filem Frida yang selari dengan lukisan-lukisan watak utama itu, dan dalam proses tersebut mencipta sebuah karya seni yang mahir dan unik.
back_translation: Star actress/producer Salma Hayek and director Julie Taymor have woven a unique and distinctive visual style into the film Frida that aligns with the main character's paintings, creating a skillful and unique work of art in the process.

text: what -lrb- denis -rrb- accomplishes in his chilling , unnerving film is a double portrait of two young women whose lives were as claustrophic , suffocating and chilly as the attics to which they were inevitably consigned .
translation: Apa yang Denis capai dalam filem seram dan membingitkan beliau adalah lukisan berganda tentang dua wanita muda yang kehidupannya sesak, sesak dan dingin seperti loteng tempat mereka akhirnya ditujukan.
back_translation: What Denis achieves in his horrifying and mesmerizing film is a dual portrait of two young women whose lives are constricted, stifled, and cold like the attic they ultimately end up in.

text: to build a feel-good fantasy around a vain dictator-madman is off-putting , to say the least , not to mention inappropriate and wildly undeserved .
translation: Membina khayalan yang menyenangkan tentang seorang diktator gila yang sombong sungguh tidak menyenangkan, untuk tidak mengatakan paling kurang, lebih-lebih lagi tidak sesuai dan sangat tidak layak.
back_translation: Constructing enjoyable fantasies about a deranged, arrogant dictator is truly displeasing, not to mention at the very least, inappropriate, and highly unwarranted.

text: a generic bloodbath that often becomes laughably unbearable when it is n't merely offensive .
translation: Pembantaian berdarah generik yang seringkali menjadi tidak tertahankan dengan cara yang lucu apabila tidak hanya menyinggung.
back_translation: Generic bloody massacres often become unbearable in a funny way when not just offensive.

text: judith and zaza 's extended bedroom sequence ... is so intimate and sensual and funny and psychologically self-revealing that it makes most of what passes for sex in the movies look like cheap hysterics .
translation: Seksyen bilik tidur yang diubahsuai untuk Judith dan Zaza begitu intim dan sensual serta lucu dan secara psikologi mendedahkan diri, hingga menjadikan kebanyakan adegan seks dalam filem kelihatan seperti histeria murahan.
back_translation: The modified bedroom section for Judith and Zaza is so intimate and sensual yet funny and psychologically revealing, making most of the sex scenes in the movie look like cheap hysteria.

text: with an unusual protagonist -lrb- a kilt-wearing jackson -rrb- and subject matter , the improbable `` formula 51 '' is somewhat entertaining , but it could have been much stronger .
translation: Dengan protagonis yang tidak biasa -lrb- seorang Jackson yang memakai kilt -rrb- dan isu yang tidak lazim, filem "formula 51" agak menghiburkan, tetapi ia boleh menjadi lebih kuat.
back_translation: With an unusual protagonist - a Jackson wearing a kilt - and unconventional issues, "Formula 51" is quite entertaining, but it could be stronger.

text: this is the kind of movie during which you want to bang your head on the seat in front of you , at its cluelessness , at its idiocy , at its utterly misplaced earnestness .
translation: Ini adalah jenis filem yang semasa menontonnya, anda ingin memukul kepala anda pada tempat duduk di hadapan anda, atas kebodohannya, atas kebodohannya, dan atas kesungguhan yang terpesong sepenuhnya.
back_translation: This is the kind of movie that while watching it, you feel like banging your head on the seat in front of you, due to its stupidity, its idiocy, and its utter lack of seriousness.

text: its appeal will probably limited to lds church members and undemanding armchair tourists .

text: the latest adam sandler assault and possibly the worst film of the year .

text: the determination of pinochet 's victims to seek justice , and their often heartbreaking testimony , spoken directly into director patricio guzman 's camera , pack a powerful emotional wallop .
translation: Tekad mangsa-mangsa Pinochet untuk mencari keadilan, dan kesaksian mereka yang kerap menyayat hati, disampaikan terus ke kamera pengarah Patricio Guzman, mengandungi kesan emosi yang kuat.
back_translation: The determination of Pinochet's victims to seek justice, and their often heart-wrenching testimonies, are conveyed directly to filmmaker Patricio Guzman's camera, containing powerful emotional impact.

text: a beautiful , timeless and universal tale of heated passions -- jealousy , betrayal , forgiveness and murder .
translation: kisah yang indah, abadi, dan universal tentang gairah yang membara - cemburu, pengkhianatan, pengampunan, dan pembunuhan.

back_translation: Who needs mind-boggling materials when they can see this, the final installment of the 'qatsi' trilogy directed by Godfrey Reggio, with music by Philip Glass?

text: disjointed parody .
translation: parodi yang tidak kena padan.
back_translation: a mismatched parody.

text: typical animé , with cheapo animation -lrb- like saturday morning tv in the '60s -rrb- , a complex sword-and-sorcery plot and characters who all have big round eyes and japanese names .
translation: Animé biasa, dengan animasi murahan (seperti TV pagi Sabtu pada tahun 60-an), plot pedang sihir yang kompleks dan watak yang semuanya mempunyai mata besar bulat dan nama Jepun.
back_translation: Ordinary anime, with cheap animation (like Saturday morning TV in the 60s), a complex sword magic plot, and characters all with big round eyes and Japanese names.

text: the plot is nothing but boilerplate clichés from start to finish , and the script assumes that not only would subtlety be lost on the target audience , but that it 's also too stupid to realize that they 've already seen this exact same movie a hundred times
translation: Plot ini tidak lain hanyalah klise biasa dari mula hingga akhir, dan skripnya menganggap bahawa bukan sahaja kehalusan akan hilang pada penonton sasaran, tetapi juga bahawa mereka terlalu bodoh untuk sedar bahawa mereka sudah melihat filem yang sama ini seratus kali.

text: angela gheorghiu as famous prima donna floria tosca , roberto alagna as her lover mario cavaradossi , and ruggero as the villainous , lecherous police chief scarpia , all sing beautifully and act adequately .

back_translation: Angela Gheorghiu as the famous prima donna Floria Tosca, Roberto Alagna as her lover Mario Cavaradossi, and Ruggero as the wicked and lecherous villain, the police chief Scarpia, all sang beautifully and acted quite well.

text: gondry 's direction is adequate ... but what gives human nature its unique feel is kaufman 's script .

translation: Salah satu filem aksi yang paling mendebarkan yang lahir dari China dalam beberapa tahun terakhir.

translation: Glamor tetapi formulaik dan bodoh ... ‘top of the world’ cagney telah digantikan oleh dasar tong drum.

text: unpretentious , charming , quirky , original

text: it 's a thin notion , repetitively stretched out to feature length , awash in self-consciously flashy camera effects , droning house music and flat , flat dialogue .
translation: Ia adalah satu konsep tipis, berulang kali diregangkan menjadi panjang, diselaputi dengan kesan kamera yang mencolok secara berlebihan, muzik house yang monoton dan dialog yang datar, sangat datar.
back_translation: It is a thin concept, repeatedly stretched to length, wrapped in an overly flashy camera effect, monotonous house music, and extremely flat dialogue.

translation: filem seram yang membosankan, bodoh, dan tak orisinil.

translation: Walaupun dari segi standard humor yang rendah, Sorority Boys tetap tidak lucu.

translation: Filem komedi romantis yang mesra tetapi kurang berkhasiat yang gagal untuk menandingi kesegaran kerjasama sebelum ini antara pelakon-penerbit dan penulis, miss congeniality.

text: the movie spends more time with schneider than with newcomer mcadams , even though her performance is more interesting -lrb- and funnier -rrb- than his .

text: it is a popcorn film , not a must-own , or even a must-see .

back_translation: A portrait that reflects, respects deeply the subculture, with its own rules regarding love and family, governance, and hierarchy.

text: -lrb- caine -rrb- proves once again he has n't lost his touch , bringing off a superb performance in an admittedly middling film .
translation: Caine sekali lagi membuktikan bahawa dia masih lagi hebat, memberikan persembahan yang hebat dalam filem yang agak sederhana.

text: this is n't a new idea .
translation: Ini bukan idea baru.

text: that haynes can both maintain and dismantle the facades that his genre and his character construct is a wonderous accomplishment of veracity and narrative grace .
translation: bahawa Haynes boleh sama-sama mengekalkan dan membongkar tirai yang dibangunkan oleh genre dan wataknya adalah satu pencapaian yang mengagumkan dari segi kebenaran dan ketinggian naratif.

text: just bring on the battle bots , please !
translation: Mari kita mulakan pertarungan bot!

translation: tetapi pertama, anda perlu memberikan alasan kepada penonton untuk mahu memberikan usaha itu.

text: for all the dolorous trim , secretary is a genial romance that maintains a surprisingly buoyant tone throughout , notwithstanding some of the writers ' sporadic dips into pop freudianism .
translation: Walaupun segala hiasan yang sedih, "secretary" merupakan sebuah romance yang mesra yang mengekalkan nada yang cukup riang sepanjang cerita, walaupun beberapa penulis kadang-kadang menjelajah ke dalam bidang freudianisme pop.

text: a bright , inventive , thoroughly winning flight of revisionist fancy .
translation: suatu penerbangan cerdik, kreatif, benar-benar menang dalam khayalan revisi.

text: just about the surest bet for an all-around good time at the movies this summer .
translation: satu taruhan yang hampir pasti untuk waktu yang baik di pawagam pada musim panas ini.

text: those of you who are not an eighth grade girl will most likely doze off during this one .
translation: Mereka yang bukan gadis darjah lapan kemungkinan besar akan mengantuk semasa ini.

text: a rambling ensemble piece with loosely connected characters and plots that never quite gel .
translation: satu karya ansambel yang berkelindan dengan watak dan plot yang tidak begitu padu.

text: greg kinnear gives a mesmerizing performance as a full-fledged sex addict who is in complete denial about his obsessive behavior .
translation: Greg Kinnear memberikan persembahan yang memukau sebagai seorang pecandu seks sepenuhnya yang enggan mengakui kelakuan obsesifnya.

text: this action-thriller\/dark comedy is one of the most repellent things to pop up in a cinematic year already littered with celluloid garbage .

text: director george hickenlooper has had some success with documentaries , but here his sense of story and his juvenile camera movements smack of a film school undergrad , and his maudlin ending might not have gotten him into film school in the first place .

text: the way home is an ode to unconditional love and compassion garnered from years of seeing it all , a condition only the old are privy to , and ... often misconstrued as weakness .

text: it 's a hoot watching the rock chomp on jumbo ants , pull an arrow out of his back , and leap unscathed through raging fire !

back_translation: It is very entertaining to watch the rock chewing on the giant ant, pulling out the arrow from its back, and jumping unharmed through the raging fire!

text: giggling at the absurdities and inconsistencies is part of the fun .

text: the film is insightful about kissinger 's background and history .

text: it makes me feel weird \/ thinking about all the bad things in the world \/ like puppies with broken legs \/ and butterflies that die \/ and movies starring pop queens
translation: Ini membuat saya berasa aneh \/ memikirkan semua perkara buruk di dunia ini \/ seperti anak anjing dengan kaki patah \/ dan kupu-kupu yang mati \/ dan filem-filem yang dibintangi oleh ratu pop.

text: a brilliant , absurd collection of vignettes that , in their own idiosyncratic way , sum up the strange horror of life in the new millennium .

text: beautiful , cold , oddly colorful and just plain otherworldly , a freaky bit of art that 's there to scare while we delight in the images .

text: this is n't a stand up and cheer flick ; it 's a sit down and ponder affair .
translation: Ini bukan filem yang membangkitkan semangat; ini filem yang membuat kita duduk dan merenung.

text: this story still seems timely and important .

text: jae-eun jeong 's take care of my cat brings a beguiling freshness to a coming-of-age story with such a buoyant , expressive flow of images that it emerges as another key contribution to the flowering of the south korean cinema .
translation: Take care of my cat oleh Jae-eun Jeong membawa keceriaan yang memikat ke dalam sebuah kisah peralihan remaja dengan aliran imej yang keras dan ekspresif sehingga muncul sebagai sumbangan penting yang lain kepada perkembangan filem Korea Selatan.

text: the film 's appeal has a lot to do with the casting of juliette binoche as sand , who brings to the role her pale , dark beauty and characteristic warmth .

text: like the english patient and the unbearable lightness of being , the hours is one of those reputedly `` unfilmable '' novels that has bucked the odds to emerge as an exquisite motion picture in its own right .

text: the footage of the rappers at play and the prison interview with suge knight are just two of the elements that will grab you .

text: -lrb- f -rrb- rom the performances and the cinematography to the outstanding soundtrack and unconventional narrative , the film is blazingly alive and admirable on many levels .

text: it 's bedeviled by labored writing and slack direction .

translation: Tenang, matang dan hampir lebih megah daripada sebarang filem kontemporari tahun ini... sebuah kajian yang sejati, sebuah filem dengan hati dan minda yang suka bertanya dan tidak takut untuk mengakui bahawa ia tidak mempunyai semua jawapan.

text: feel free to go get popcorn whenever he 's not onscreen .

text: a lot like the imaginary sport it projects onto the screen -- loud , violent and mindless .

text: i 'm not sure which will take longer to heal : the welt on johnny knoxville 's stomach from a riot-control projectile or my own tortured psyche .

translation: Pasti ada sesuatu yang salah dengan satu komedi di mana gelak tawa hanya datang dari koleksi adegan gagal yang dipasangkan di hujung kredit akhir.
back_translation: Surely there is something wrong with a comedy where laughter only comes from a collection of failed scenes paired at the end of the end credits.

text: no , it 's not as single-minded as john carpenter 's original , but it 's sure a lot smarter and more unnerving than the sequels .
translation: Tidak, filem ini tidak sefanatik filem asal John Carpenter, tetapi ia pasti lebih bijak dan lebih mengganggu daripada sekuelnya.
back_translation: No, this film is not as fanatical as the original John Carpenter film, but it is certainly wiser and more disturbing than its sequel.

text: beating the austin powers films at their own game , this blaxploitation spoof downplays the raunch in favor of gags that rely on the strength of their own cleverness as opposed to the extent of their outrageousness .
translation: Mengalahkan filem-filem Austin Powers dalam permainan mereka sendiri, spoof blaxploitation ini mengurangkan unsur cabul demi gurauan yang bergantung pada kebijaksanaan mereka sendiri berbanding tahap keanehan mereka.
back_translation: Beating the Austin Powers movies at their own game, this blaxploitation spoof reduces the raunch factor in favor of jokes that rely on their own wit rather than their level of absurdity.

text: viewers are asked so often to suspend belief that were it not for holm 's performance , the film would be a total washout .
translation: Penonton sering diminta untuk menangguhkan kepercayaan sehingga jika bukan kerana lakonan Holm, filem ini akan menjadi sepenuhnya gagal.
back_translation: Audiences are often asked to suspend disbelief so that if not for Holm's performance, this film would have been a complete failure.

text: there 's no palpable chemistry between lopez and male lead ralph fiennes , plus the script by working girl scribe kevin wade is workmanlike in the extreme .
translation: Tiada kimia yang jelas antara Lopez dan pelakon lelaki utama Ralph Fiennes, tambahan pula skrip oleh penulis Working Girl, Kevin Wade, terlalu kerja sekadar untuk seseorang.
back_translation: There is no clear chemistry between Lopez and the male lead actor Ralph Fiennes, especially with a script by Working Girl writer, Kevin Wade, working just for the sake of it.

text: - spy action flick with antonio banderas and lucy liu never comes together .
translation: Filem aksi pengintip dengan Antonio Banderas dan Lucy Liu tidak pernah berjaya disatukan.
back_translation: The spy action film with Antonio Banderas and Lucy Liu has never succeeded in being united.

text: there 's already been too many of these films ...
translation: Sudah terlalu banyak filem-filem sebegini...
back_translation: There are too many movies like this...

text: we want the funk - and this movie 's got it .
translation: Kami mahu irama funk - dan filem ini memilikinya.
back_translation: We want the funk rhythm - and this movie has it.

text: -lrb- a -rrb- thoughtful , visually graceful work .
translation: Satu karya yang berfikir, indah secara visual.
back_translation: One work that is thoughtful and visually beautiful.

text: shows moments of promise but ultimately succumbs to cliches and pat storytelling .
translation: menunjukkan momen-momen yang menjanjikan tetapi akhirnya tunduk pada stereotaip dan cerita klise.
back_translation: shows promising moments but eventually succumbs to stereotypes and cliché storylines.

text: like the rugrats movies , the wild thornberrys movie does n't offer much more than the series , but its emphasis on caring for animals and respecting other cultures is particularly welcome .
translation: Sama seperti filem Rugrats, filem Wild Thornberrys tidak menawarkan banyak perbezaan dari siri TV, tetapi penekanannya pada menjaga haiwan dan menghormati budaya lain sangat dialu-alukan.
back_translation: Similar to the Rugrats movie, the Wild Thornberrys movie doesn't offer much variation from the TV series, but its emphasis on caring for animals and respecting other cultures is very much welcomed.

text: a waterlogged version of ` fatal attraction ' for the teeny-bopper set ... a sad , soggy potboiler that wastes the talents of its attractive young leads .
translation: sebuah versi berair yang berlebihan daripada 'fatal attraction' untuk golongan remaja... sebuah cerita yang sedih dan lembik yang menyia-nyiakan bakat pelakon muda yang menarik.
back_translation: An overly watery version of 'fatal attraction' for teenagers... a sad and mushy story that wastes the talent of an attractive young actor.

text: the film starts promisingly , but the ending is all too predictable and far too cliched to really work .
translation: Filem bermula dengan baik, tetapi akhirnya terlalu mudah diteka dan terlalu klise untuk benar-benar berkesan.
back_translation: The movie started well but ended up being too predictable and too cliché to be truly impressive.

text: the script manages the rare trick of seeming at once both refreshingly different and reassuringly familiar .
translation: Skrip tersebut berjaya dengan langka kerana pada satu masa ia kelihatan sama ada segar dan berbeza serta memberi rasa yang dikenali dan memberi keyakinan.
back_translation: The script succeeded with strides as it appeared at one point both fresh and different while providing a familiar taste and instilling confidence.

text: kudos to the most enchanting film of the year .
translation: Tahniah kepada filem paling memukau dalam tahun ini.
back_translation: Congratulations to the most captivating film of the year.

text: the engagingly primitive animated special effects contribute to a mood that 's sustained through the surprisingly somber conclusion .
translation: Kesan khas animasi yang primitif menyumbang kepada suasana yang dikekalkan melalui kesimpulan yang agak suram.
back_translation: The special effect of primitive animation contributes to the atmosphere maintained through a rather gloomy conclusion.

text: by its modest , straight-ahead standards , undisputed scores a direct hit .
translation: Dengan standard sederhana dan langsungnya, Undisputed mencatatkan kejayaan yang langsung tepat sasaran.
back_translation: With its simple and direct standard, Undisputed achieves success that hits the mark.

text: i 'm guessing the director is a magician .
translation: Saya mengesyaki pengarah itu seorang ahli sihir.
back_translation: I suspect that the director is a wizard.

text: a dashing and absorbing outing with one of france 's most inventive directors .
translation: satu perjalanan yang berani dan menarik dengan salah seorang pengarah paling berinovatif dari Perancis.
back_translation: an adventurous and exciting journey with one of the most innovative directors from France.

text: it irritates and saddens me that martin lawrence 's latest vehicle can explode obnoxiously into 2,500 screens while something of bubba ho-tep 's clearly evident quality may end up languishing on a shelf somewhere .
translation: Saya terganggu dan sedih kerana kenderaan terbaru Martin Lawrence boleh meletup dengan begitu teruk di 2,500 skrin manakala sesuatu berkualiti yang jelas pada Bubba Ho-tep mungkin terbiar di rak di suatu tempat.
back_translation: I am disturbed and saddened because Martin Lawrence's latest vehicle could explode so badly on 2,500 screens while something clearly quality like Bubba Ho-tep might be left on a shelf somewhere.

text: that chirpy songbird britney spears has popped up with more mindless drivel .
translation: Burung berkicau Britney Spears itu muncul dengan lebih banyak omongan yang tak bermakna.

text: none of the characters or plot-lines are fleshed-out enough to build any interest .
translation: Tiada salah satu watak atau plot berjalan yang dilukiskan dengan mencukupi untuk menimbulkan sebarang minat.
back_translation: None of the characters or plotlines are depicted sufficiently to generate any interest.

text: when all is said and done , she loves them to pieces -- and so , i trust , will you .
translation: Apabila semua telah dikatakan dan dilakukan, dia sangat mencintai mereka - dan begitu juga, saya percaya, kamu akan.
back_translation: When all is said and done, he loves them very much - and likewise, I believe, so will you.

text: ultimately too repellent to fully endear itself to american art house audiences , but it is notable for its stylistic austerity and forcefulness .
translation: Pada akhirnya terlalu menjijikkan untuk benar-benar disenangi oleh penonton seni Amerika, tetapi ia mencolok dengan kesederhanaan gaya dan kekuatan yang dimilikinya.
back_translation: In the end it was just too repulsive to truly be appreciated by American art audiences, but it stands out with its simplicity of style and power it possesses.

text: kids do n't mind crappy movies as much as adults , provided there 's lots of cute animals and clumsy people .
translation: Kanak-kanak tidak kisah filem yang tidak bagus sebanyak orang dewasa, asalkan terdapat banyak haiwan comel dan orang yang kelam kabut.
back_translation: Children do not mind bad movies as much as adults, as long as there are plenty of cute animals and chaotic people.

text: it forces you to watch people doing unpleasant things to each other and themselves , and it maintains a cool distance from its material that is deliberately unsettling .
translation: Ia memaksa anda untuk menonton orang melakukan perkara yang tidak menyenangkan kepada satu sama lain dan diri mereka sendiri, dan ia mengekalkan jarak yang tenang dari bahan-bahannya yang disengaja membuatkan anda berasa tidak selesa.
back_translation: It forces you to watch people do unpleasant things to each other and themselves, and it maintains a calm distance from its deliberately disturbing material to make you feel uncomfortable.

text: wonder , hope and magic can never escape the heart of the boy when the right movie comes along , especially if it begins with the name of star wars
translation: Kagum, harapan dan keajaiban tidak akan pernah lepas dari hati budak lelaki apabila filem yang tepat muncul, terutamanya jika bermula dengan nama Star Wars.

text: while the performances are often engaging , this loose collection of largely improvised numbers would probably have worked better as a one-hour tv documentary .
translation: Walaupun persembahan-persembahan seringkali menarik, kumpulan lagu-lagu yang kebanyakkannya diimprovisasi ini mungkin lebih baik jika dijadikan sebagai dokumentari tv selama satu jam.
back_translation: Although performances are often captivating, this group of mostly improvised songs might be better presented as a one-hour TV documentary.

text: haneke 's script -lrb- from elfriede jelinek 's novel -rrb- is contrived , unmotivated , and psychologically unpersuasive , with an inconclusive ending .
translation: Skrip haneke (dari novel Elfriede Jelinek) adalah direka secara paksa, tidak bermotivasi, dan tidak meyakinkan dari segi psikologi, dengan penamat yang tidak jelas.
back_translation: Haneke's script (from the novel Elfriede Jelinek) is forcibly designed, unmotivated, and unconvincing in terms of psychology, with an unclear ending.

text: there is only so much baked cardboard i need to chew .
translation: Hanya beberapa keping kadbod yang saya perlu kunyah sahaja.
back_translation: I only need to chew on a few pieces of cardboard.

text: the movie is loaded with good intentions , but in his zeal to squeeze the action and our emotions into the all-too-familiar dramatic arc of the holocaust escape story , minac drains his movie of all individuality .
translation: Filem ini penuh dengan niat baik, tetapi dalam kegemilangan untuk memadatkan aksi dan emosi kita ke dalam lengkungan dramatik holokaus yang terlalu dikenali, Minac mengekalkan filemnya tanpa sebarang keperibadian.
back_translation: This movie is full of good intentions, but in the glory of compacting actions and emotions into the well-known Holocaust dramatic arc, Minac keeps his film devoid of any personality.

text: tully is worth a look for its true-to-life characters , its sensitive acting , its unadorned view of rural life and the subtle direction of first-timer hilary birmingham .
translation: Tully layak dilihat kerana watak-watak yang realistik, lakonan yang sensitif, pandangan yang tak dihiasi mengenai kehidupan bandar, dan pengarahan halus oleh pengarah baharu, Hilary Birmingham.
back_translation: "Tully is worth watching for its realistic characters, sensitive acting, unadorned view of urban life, and subtle direction by the new director, Hilary Birmingham."

text: filmmaker tian zhuangzhuang triumphantly returns to narrative filmmaking with a visually masterful work of quiet power .
translation: Pengarah filem Tian Zhuangzhuang kembali ke penyutradaraan naratif dengan karya yang memukau secara visual dan penuh kuasa yang tenang.
back_translation: Film director Tian Zhuangzhuang returns to narrative filmmaking with a visually stunning and quietly powerful work.

text: ... a movie that , quite simply , should n't have been made .
translation: ... sebuah filem yang sepatutnya tidak perlu dihasilkan.

text: the importance of being earnest , so thick with wit it plays like a reading from bartlett 's familiar quotations
translation: kepentingan untuk menjadi jujur, begitu kaya dengan sindiran sehingga ia seperti membaca petikan dari kutipan-kutipan yang dikenali oleh Bartlett.

text: five screenwriters are credited with the cliché-laden screenplay ; it seems as if each watered down the version of the one before .
translation: Lima penulis skrin dikreditkan dengan naskah yang penuh dengan cliché; nampaknya setiap orang menurunkan versi yang sebelumnya.
back_translation: Five screenwriters credited with a script full of clichés; it seems like everyone just followed the previous version.

text: director alfonso cuaron gets vivid , convincing performances from a fine cast , and generally keeps things going at a rapid pace , occasionally using an omniscient voice-over narrator in the manner of french new wave films .
translation: Pengarah Alfonso Cuaron mendapat persembahan hidup dan meyakinkan daripada pelakon-pelakon yang hebat, dan secara amnya menjaga kelajuan cerita pada tahap yang pantas, kadang-kadang menggunakan pencerita suara omniscient seperti dalam filem gelombang baru Perancis.
back_translation: Director Alfonso Cuaron received lively and convincing performances from great actors, and generally maintained the pace of the story at a brisk level, sometimes using omniscient voice narration like in French New Wave films.

text: ... manages to deliver a fair bit of vampire fun .
translation: ...berjaya memberikan sejumlah keseronokan vampir yang cukup baik.
back_translation: ...successfully providing a fair amount of enjoyable vampire fun.

text: guys say mean things and shoot a lot of bullets .
translation: Lelaki mengeluarkan perkataan kasar dan menembak banyak peluru.
back_translation: The man utters harsh words and shoots many bullets.

text: wewannour money back , actually .
translation: Kami mahu wang kami dikembalikan.
back_translation: We want our money refunded.

text: more than anything else , kissing jessica stein injects freshness and spirit into the romantic comedy genre , which has been held hostage by generic scripts that seek to remake sleepless in seattle again and again .
translation: Lebih daripada segala-galanya, ciuman kepada Jessica Stein menyuntik kesegaran dan semangat ke dalam genre komedi romantis, yang selama ini ditawan oleh skrip generik yang cuba menghasilkan semula filem Sleepless in Seattle berulang kali.
back_translation: Above all, the kiss to Jessica Stein injects freshness and spirit into the romantic comedy genre, which has been held captive by generic scripts attempting to recreate the film Sleepless in Seattle repeatedly.

text: when cowering and begging at the feet a scruffy giannini , madonna gives her best performance since abel ferrara had her beaten to a pulp in his dangerous game .
translation: Apabila merunduk dan merayu di kaki Giannini yang kusut, Madonna memberikan persembahan terbaiknya sejak Abel Ferrara memukulnya sehingga lebam dalam permainan berbahaya beliau.
back_translation: When she bowed down and pleaded at Giannini's feet, Madonna delivered her best performance since Abel Ferrara hit her until bruised in his dangerous game.

text: the sheer joy and pride they took in their work -- and in each other -- shines through every frame .
translation: Kegembiraan dan kebanggaan yang begitu ketara dalam pekerjaan mereka - dan antara satu sama lain - terserlah dalam setiap adegan.
back_translation: The joy and pride that are so evident in their work - and towards each other - shine through in every scene.

text: the cumulative effect of the movie is repulsive and depressing .
translation: Kesan kumulatif filem itu adalah menjijikkan dan memurunkan semangat.

text: ... digs beyond the usual portrayals of good kids and bad seeds to reveal a more ambivalent set of characters and motivations .
translation: ...mendedalam melebihi gambaran biasa tentang kanak-kanak baik dan anak durhaka untuk mendedahkan satu set watak dan motif yang lebih ambivalen.

translation: Banyak yang memukau tentang filem All About Lily Chou-Chou: ada sesetengah bahagian yang begitu sedih sehingga boleh membuat anda menangis.

text: it 's a rollicking adventure for you and all your mateys , regardless of their ages .
translation: Ini adalah pengembaraan yang mengasyikkan bagi anda dan semua rakan anda, tanpa mengira umur mereka.
back_translation: This is an exciting adventure for you and all your friends, regardless of their age.

text: an empty shell of an epic rather than the real deal .
translation: sekadar kulit kosong sebuah epik daripada yang sebenar.

translation: Scherfig telah membuat filem yang akan membuat anda tertanya-tanya tentang kehidupan watak-watak selepas kredit pintar selesai.
back_translation: Scherfig has made a film that will make you wonder about the lives of the characters after the end credits roll.

text: it may be a somewhat backhanded compliment to say that the film makes the viewer feel like the movie 's various victimized audience members after a while , but it also happens to be the movie 's most admirable quality
translation: Mungkin agak sinis untuk mengatakan bahawa filem membuat penonton berasa seperti anggota penonton yang menjadi mangsa filem itu setelah beberapa lama, tetapi ia juga kebetulan menjadi kualiti paling mulia filem itu.
back_translation: It may sound somewhat sarcastic to say that a film makes the audience feel like the audience members are victims of the film after a while, but it also happens to be the film's most admirable quality.

text: a delightful entree in the tradition of food movies .
translation: satu hidangan masakan yang memikat dalam tradisi filem makanan.

translation: Johnnie To dan Wai Ka Fai pasti akan menarik perhatian penonton Amerika peminat aksi-petualangan, tetapi minat filem ini mungkin terlalu sempit untuk menarik penonton yang lebih meluas.
back_translation: Johnnie To and Wai Ka Fai are sure to attract the attention of American action-adventure fans, but the appeal of this film may be too narrow to attract a broader audience.

text: conceptually brilliant ... plays like a living-room war of the worlds , gaining most of its unsettling force from the suggested and the unknown .
translation: Secara konseptual brilian ... bermain seperti perang dunia dalam bilik tamu, mendapatkan kekuatan yang mengganggu daripada yang dicadangkan dan tidak diketahui.
back_translation: Conceptually brilliant... playing out like a world war in the living room, harnessing disruptive power from the suggested and unknown.

text: this feature is about as necessary as a hole in the head
translation: Ciri ini sama pentingnya seperti lubang di kepala.
back_translation: This feature is as important as a hole in the head.

text: -lrb- danny huston gives -rrb- an astounding performance that deftly , gradually reveals a real human soul buried beneath a spellbinding serpent 's smirk .
translation: Penampilan Danny Huston memberikan aksi yang mengagumkan yang dengan cekap, secara perlahan memperlihatkan jiwa manusia sejati yang terkubur di bawah senyuman ular yang memukau.
back_translation: Danny Huston's performance provides a stunning display of skill, gradually revealing the true human soul buried beneath the mesmerizing snake-like smile.

text: in addition to hoffman 's powerful acting clinic , this is that rare drama that offers a thoughtful and rewarding glimpse into the sort of heartache everyone has felt , or will feel someday .
translation: Selain klinik lakonan yang hebat oleh Hoffman, drama ini adalah salah satu drama langka yang memberikan pandangan berfikir dan mendamaikan mengenai duka lara yang semua orang pernah rasakan, atau akan rasakan suatu hari nanti.
back_translation: Apart from Hoffman's superb acting clinic, this drama is one of the rare dramas that provides thoughtful and soothing insights into the pain that everyone has experienced, or will experience someday.

text: this is n't exactly profound cinema , but it 's good-natured and sometimes quite funny .
translation: Ini bukanlah filem yang sangat mendalam, tetapi ia bersifat baik dan kadang-kadang cukup lucu.
back_translation: This is not a very profound movie, but it is good-natured and sometimes quite funny.

text: hailed as a clever exercise in neo-hitchcockianism , this clever and very satisfying picture is more accurately chabrolian .
translation: Dipuji sebagai latihan yang bijak dalam neo-hitchcockianism, gambar yang bijak dan sangat memuaskan ini lebih tepatnya chabrolian.
back_translation: Praised as a wise exercise in neo-Hitchcockianism, this clever and highly satisfying image is more precisely Chabrolian.

text: it leers , offering next to little insight into its intriguing subject .
translation: Ia merenung, menawarkan sedikit pandangan mengenai subjek yang menarik.
back_translation: It gazes, offering a little insight into an interesting subject.

translation: Tempat duduk yang menyenangkan dan cukup menarik, tetapi dalam cuba untuk mendapat yang terbaik dari kedua-dua dunia, ia akhirnya tidak mencapai prestasi sepenuhnya.
back_translation: A pleasant and somewhat interesting seat, but in an attempt to get the best of both worlds, it ultimately did not achieve full performance.

text: touches smartly and wistfully on a number of themes , not least the notion that the marginal members of society ... might benefit from a helping hand and a friendly kick in the pants .
translation: menyentuh dengan bijak dan penuh kerinduan pada beberapa tema, tak terkecuali gagasan bahawa ahli-ahli margin masyarakat ... mungkin akan mendapat manfaat dari bantuan serta tunjuk ajar yang mesra.
back_translation: touching wisely and with longing on several themes, not excluding the idea that members of marginalized communities ... might benefit from friendly assistance and guidance.

text: yakusho , as always , is wonderful as the long-faced sad sack ... and his chemistry with shimizu is very believable .
translation: yakusho , seperti biasa , sangat hebat sebagai si malang yang selalu bersedih ... dan kimia di antara mereka dengan shimizu sangat meyakinkan.
back_translation: Yakusho, as usual, is very great as the unfortunate one who is always sad... and the chemistry between them with Shimizu is very convincing.

text: works , it 's thanks to huston 's revelatory performance .
translation: Ia berjaya berkat kepada persembahan yang revolusioner oleh Huston.

text: ararat feels like a book report
translation: Ararat terasa seperti laporan buku.
back_translation: Ararat feels like a book report.

text: the beautiful images and solemn words can not disguise the slack complacency of -lrb- godard 's -rrb- vision , any more than the gorgeous piano and strings on the soundtrack can drown out the tinny self-righteousness of his voice .
translation: Gambar-gambar yang indah dan kata-kata yang meresap tidak dapat menyembunyikan sikap kepuasan diri yang lemah dalam visi Godard, sama seperti piano indah dan instrumen gesek di latar bunyi tidak dapat meredam keegoisan murahan suaranya.
back_translation: Beautiful pictures and penetrating words cannot hide the weak self-satisfaction in Godard's vision, just like beautiful pianos and string instruments in the background sound cannot suppress the cheap selfishness of his voice.

text: tully is in many ways the perfect festival film : a calm , self-assured portrait of small town regret , love , duty and friendship that appeals to the storytelling instincts of a slightly more literate filmgoing audience .
translation: Tully adalah filem festival yang sempurna dalam pelbagai cara: potret yang tenang dan yakin tentang penyesalan di bandar kecil, cinta, kewajipan, dan persahabatan yang memberi daya tarikan kepada naluri bercerita penonton filem yang sedikit lebih berpengetahuan.
back_translation: Tully is the perfect festival film in many ways: a quiet and confident portrait of regrets in a small town, love, duty, and friendship that appeal to the storytelling instincts of slightly more knowledgeable film audiences.

text: it 's a shame the marvelous first 101 minutes have to be combined with the misconceived final 5 .
translation: Sungguh memalukan bahawa 101 minit pertama yang hebat perlu digabungkan dengan 5 minit terakhir yang tersalah anggap.
back_translation: It's truly embarrassing that 101 great minutes need to be combined with the mistakenly understood 5 final minutes.

text: a surprisingly charming and even witty match for the best of hollywood 's comic-book adaptations .
translation: sebuah padanan yang mengejutkan memikat dan malah pandai bagi adaptasi buku komik terbaik Hollywood.
back_translation: A surprising and captivating match that is even clever for adapting the best Hollywood comic book.

text: my advice is to skip the film and pick up the soundtrack .
translation: Cadangan saya adalah untuk abaikan filem tersebut dan ambil album muziknya.
back_translation: My suggestion is to ignore the movie and get the music album instead.

text: audacious-impossible yet compelling ...
translation: berani-mustahil namun memikat ...

text: a quasi-documentary by french filmmaker karim dridi that celebrates the hardy spirit of cuban music .
translation: Sebuah quasi-dokumentari oleh pengarah filem Perancis, Karim Dridi, yang meraikan semangat yang kuat dalam muzik Cuba.
back_translation: A quasi-documentary by the French filmmaker, Karim Dridi, celebrating the strong spirit of Cuban music.

text: family fare .
translation: tawar saudara.

translation: Filem tersebut dengan tegar mengelak semua kemungkinan komedi daripada situasinya, dan menjadi satu lagi komedi bodoh persekolah tentang gurauan seks dan tarikh prom.

text: one of recent memory 's most thoughtful films about art , ethics , and the cost of moral compromise .
translation: Salah satu filem yang paling berfikiran tentang seni, etika, dan kos pengorbanan moral dalam ingatan baru-baru ini.
back_translation: One of the most thought-provoking films about art, ethics, and the cost of moral sacrifice in recent memory.

text: even if you 're an agnostic carnivore , you can enjoy much of jonah simply , and gratefully , as laugh-out-loud lunacy with a pronounced monty pythonesque flavor .
translation: Walaupun anda seorang karnivor agnostik, anda masih boleh menikmati banyak hal dari cerita Jonah secara mudah dan dengan rasa syukur, sebagai kegilaan yang membuat kita ketawa terbahak-bahak dengan rasa kental gaya Monty Python.
back_translation: Even if you are an agnostic carnivore, you can still enjoy many aspects of the Jonah story in a light and grateful manner, like a madness that makes us laugh out loud with a strong taste of Monty Python's style.

text: one of the best of a growing strain of daring films ... that argue that any sexual relationship that does n't hurt anyone and works for its participants is a relationship that is worthy of our respect .
translation: Salah satu dari filem yang paling berani dalam genre yang semakin berkembang ... yang menganggap setiap hubungan seksual yang tidak menyakitkan sesiapa pun dan berfungsi untuk pesertanya adalah hubungan yang sepatutnya mendapat penghargaan kita.
back_translation: One of the most daring films in the increasingly growing genre...which considers any sexual relationship that doesn't harm anyone and serves its participants should deserve our respect.

text: set in a 1986 harlem that does n't look much like anywhere in new york .
translation: Ditetapkan di Harlem pada tahun 1986 yang tidak terlalu mirip dengan mana-mana tempat di New York.
back_translation: Set in Harlem in 1986 which is not too similar to any place in New York.

text: in the spirit of the season , i assign one bright shining star to roberto benigni 's pinocchio -- but i guarantee that no wise men will be following after it .
translation: Dalam semangat musim ini, saya mempersembahkan satu bintang yang terang bersinar untuk Pinokio karya Roberto Benigni - tetapi saya jamin bahawa tiada orang bijak yang akan mengikutinya.
back_translation: In the spirit of this season, I present a bright shining star for Roberto Benigni's Pinocchio - but I assure you that no wise person will follow it.

text: evokes a palpable sense of disconnection , made all the more poignant by the incessant use of cell phones .
translation: memperlihatkan rasa perasaan terputus yang nyata, dipertajam lagi dengan penggunaan telefon bimbit yang tidak berhenti.
back_translation: Showing a real sense of disconnected feeling, further accentuated by the incessant use of the mobile phone.

text: they crush each other under cars , throw each other out windows , electrocute and dismember their victims in full consciousness .
translation: Mereka menindih antara satu sama lain di bawah kereta, melemparkan antara satu sama lain keluar tingkap, mengelektrokusi dan membongkok mangsa mereka dalam kesedaran sepenuhnya.
back_translation: They crush each other under the carriage, throw each other out of the window, electrocute, and bend their victims fully conscious.

text: in addition to scoring high for originality of plot -- putting together familiar themes of family , forgiveness and love in a new way -- lilo & stitch has a number of other assets to commend it to movie audiences both innocent and jaded .
translation: Selain mencapai skor tertinggi dalam aspek orisinaliti plot - menggabungkan tema-tema keluarga, pengampunan, dan cinta secara baru - Lilo & Stitch mempunyai beberapa kelebihan lain yang menjadikannya layak ditonton oleh penonton filem sama ada yang naif atau yang sudah jemu.
back_translation: In addition to achieving the highest score in originality - combining themes of family, forgiveness, and love in a new way - Lilo & Stitch has several other advantages that make it worth watching by movie audiences whether they are naive or already bored.

text: perhaps it 's cliche to call the film ` refreshing , ' but it is .
translation: Mungkin klise untuk menyebut filem itu ' menyegarkan,' tetapi memang begitu.
back_translation: It may sound cliché to call the film 'refreshing,' but it truly is.

text: as predictable as the outcome of a globetrotters-generals game , juwanna mann is even more ludicrous than you 'd expect from the guy-in-a-dress genre , and a personal low for everyone involved .
translation: Seperti yang dijangkakan hasil permainan globetrotters-generals, Juwanna Mann lebih melampau daripada yang anda jangkakan dari genre lelaki berpakaian wanita, dan merupakan titik terendah peribadi untuk semua yang terlibat.
back_translation: As expected, the outcome of the Globetrotters-Generals game, Juwanna Mann exceeds what you'd expect from the cross-dressing genre, and is a personal low point for all involved.

text: almodovar is an imaginative teacher of emotional intelligence in this engaging film about two men who discover what william james once called ` the gift of tears . '
translation: Almodovar ialah seorang guru yang imaginatif dalam bidang kecerdasan emosi dalam filem yang menarik ini mengenai dua lelaki yang menemui apa yang William James pernah panggil sebagai ' hadiah tangisan '.
back_translation: Almodovar is an imaginative teacher in the field of emotional intelligence in this engaging film about two men who discover what William James once called 'the gift of tears'.

text: a fantastically vital movie that manages to invest real humor , sensuality , and sympathy into a story about two adolescent boys .
translation: Filem yang sangat penting yang berjaya menyuntikkan humor sebenar, sensualiti, dan simpati ke dalam sebuah cerita tentang dua orang remaja lelaki.
back_translation: A very important film that successfully injects genuine humor, sensuality, and sympathy into a story about two teenage boys.

text: ... the story is far-flung , illogical , and plain stupid .
translation: ... ceritanya jauh berleluasa, tidak logik, dan terlalu bodoh.

text: and lee seems just as expectant of an adoring , wide-smiling reception .
translation: dan Lee kelihatan sama sangat berharap menerima sambutan yang penuh kasih, senyuman lebar.

text: it 's all arty and jazzy and people sit and stare and turn away from one another instead of talking and it 's all about the silences and if you 're into that , have at it .
translation: Semuanya penuh seni dan jazzy, orang duduk dan menatap dan berpaling dari satu sama lain daripada bercakap, semuanya tentang keheningan dan jika anda suka itu, silakan nikmati.
back_translation: Everything is full of art and jazzy, people sitting and staring and turning away from each other instead of talking, it's all about silence and if you like it, please enjoy.

text: an old-fashioned drama of substance about a teacher 's slide down the slippery slope of dishonesty after an encounter with the rich and the powerful who have nothing but disdain for virtue .
translation: sebuah drama klasik yang bermakna mengenai penurunan seorang guru ke lembah kecurangan setelah berjumpa dengan golongan kaya dan berkuasa yang hanya menghina kejujuran.
back_translation: A meaningful classic drama about a teacher's descent into the valley of deceit after encountering the rich and powerful who only mock honesty.

text: another useless recycling of a brutal mid - '70s american sports movie .

text: the kind of movie that leaves vague impressions and a nasty aftertaste but little clear memory of its operational mechanics .
translation: Jenis filem yang meninggalkan kesan samar dan kesan pahit tapi sedikit kenangan jelas tentang mekanik operasinya.

text: hartley adds enough quirky and satirical touches in the screenplay to keep the film entertaining .

text: as literary desecrations go , this makes for perfectly acceptable , occasionally very enjoyable children 's entertainment .

text: this insufferable movie is meant to make you think about existential suffering .
translation: filem yang menyakitkan hati ini bertujuan untuk membuat anda merenung tentang penderitaan eksistensial.

text: goofy , nutty , consistently funny .
translation: lucu, gila, selalu kelakar.

text: two big things are missing -- anything approaching a visceral kick , and anything approaching even a vague reason to sit through it all .
translation: Dua perkara besar hilang - apa-apa yang mendekati rasa menyengat dan apa-apa yang mendekati sebab yang samar-samar untuk duduk menontonnya.
back_translation: Two big things are missing - anything that approaches a sting and anything that approaches a vague reason to sit and watch it.

text: if `` lilo & stitch '' is n't the most edgy piece of disney animation to hit the silver screen , then this first film to use a watercolor background since `` dumbo '' certainly ranks as the most original in years .
translation: Jika "Lilo & Stitch" bukan filem animasi Disney yang paling bermaya di pawagam perak, maka filem pertama yang menggunakan latar belakang cat air sejak "Dumbo" pastinya dianggap sebagai yang paling asli dalam beberapa tahun.
back_translation: If "Lilo & Stitch" is not the most successful Disney animated film at the box office, then the first film to use watercolor backgrounds since "Dumbo" would certainly be considered the most original in years.

text: while it has definite weaknesses -- like a rather unbelievable love interest and a meandering ending -- this '60s caper film is a riveting , brisk delight .
translation: Walaupun ia mempunyai kelemahan yang pasti -- seperti minat cinta yang agak tidak masuk akal dan akhir yang membingungkan -- filem 'caper' tahun 60-an ini adalah satu keseronokan yang menarik dan cepat.
back_translation: Although it has its definite weaknesses - such as somewhat implausible romantic interests and a confusing ending - this 60s heist film is an interesting and fast-paced delight.

text: it 's a talking head documentary , but a great one .
translation: Ini adalah sebuah dokumentari yang menggunakan gaya wawancara, tetapi ia sangat baik.

text: an extremely unpleasant film .
translation: Filem yang sangat tidak menyenangkan.

translation: Pengarah Juan Jose Campanella boleh saja menghasilkan semula filem ini menjadi tiruan Argentina dari 'Iris' atau 'American Beauty,' tetapi sebaliknya dia menggabungkan sedikit daripada setiap filem dan mencipta sesuatu yang lebih indah daripada kedua-dua filem tersebut.
back_translation: Director Juan Jose Campanella could have simply recreated this film as an Argentine imitation of 'Iris' or 'American Beauty,' but instead he blended a little bit of each film and created something more beautiful than both films combined.

text: not good enough to pass for a litmus test of the generation gap and not bad enough to repulse any generation of its fans .
translation: Tidak cukup baik untuk lulus ujian perbezaan generasi dan tidak teruk untuk menolak mana-mana generasi peminatnya.

text: merely -lrb- and literally -rrb- tosses around sex toys and offers half-hearted paeans to empowerment that are repeatedly undercut by the brutality of the jokes , most at women 's expense .
translation: hanya melemparkan mainan seks dan menawarkan puji-pujian setengah hati terhadap pemberdayaan yang berulang kali dipotong oleh kekejaman jenaka, kebanyakan merugikan wanita.

text: terrible .
translation: teruk.

translation: Menggabungkan segalanya kecuali seseorang mencabut pin dari granat dengan giginya, Windtalkers kelihatan telah menjarah setiap filem Perang Dunia II lama untuk bahan yang terlalu dikenali.
back_translation: Combining everything except for someone pulling the pin from a grenade with their teeth, Windtalkers seems to have pillaged every old World War II film for overly familiar material.

text: chai 's structure and pacing are disconcertingly slack .
translation: Struktur dan rentak chai agak longgar.

translation: Jika anda dibesarkan dengan Scooby, anda akan suka filem ini.

text: enjoyably fast-moving , hard-hitting documentary .
translation: Documentari yang bergerak cepat dan padat yang menyeronokkan.

text: if you come from a family that eats , meddles , argues , laughs , kibbitzes and fights together , then go see this delightful comedy .
translation: Jika anda datang dari keluarga yang makan bersama, campur tangan, bertengkar, ketawa, kibbitzes dan bergaduh bersama, maka pergilah menonton komedi yang menyeronokkan ini.

translation: Pengarah kebanyakannya bermain dengan serius, mengubah fabel leys menjadi penurunan sosial yang lesu.

text: millions of dollars heaped upon a project of such vast proportions need to reap more rewards than spiffy bluescreen technique and stylish weaponry .
translation: Berjuta-juta dolar yang ditumpukan ke atas sebuah projek sebesar itu perlu mendapat lebih ganjaran daripada teknik bluescreen yang kemas dan senjata bergaya.

text: any film that does n't even in passing mention political prisoners , poverty and the boat loads of people who try to escape the country is less a documentary and more propaganda by way of a valentine sealed with a kiss .
translation: Mana-mana filem yang tidak menyebut secara langsung tahanan politik, kemiskinan, dan bot yang penuh dengan orang yang cuba melarikan diri dari negara adalah kurang sebuah dokumentari dan lebih merupakan propaganda melalui cara sebuah valentin yang tersegel dengan ciuman.
back_translation: Any film that does not directly mention political detainees, poverty, and boats full of people trying to escape from the country is less of a documentary and more of a propaganda through a sealed Valentine's style with kisses.

text: it 's depressing to see how far herzog has fallen .
translation: Menyedihkan melihat betapa jauh Herzog telah jatuh.

translation: Seperti watak-watak New England-nya, yang kebanyakan berjalan-jalan dalam awan tebal penafian, filem ini akhirnya menjurus kepada urus emosi sebenarnya, memukul tali rasa sedih yang mendalam.

text: all the more disquieting for its relatively gore-free allusions to the serial murders , but it falls down in its attempts to humanize its subject .
translation: Semakin merisaukan kerana alusannya tentang pembunuhan berantai yang kurang penuh darah, tetapi gagal dalam percubaannya untuk menghumaniskan subjeknya.
back_translation: Increasingly troubling because of its gentle portrayal of a less gory serial killer, but failing in its attempt to humanize its subjects.

translation: Sebuah filem berisi keganasan kosong dan fetisis yang mana pembunuhan dianggap remeh dan menyeronokkan.

text: murderous maids pulls no punches in its depiction of the lives of the papin sister and the events that led to their notorious rise to infamy ...
translation: "Murderous maids tidak mengekang dalam penggambarannya mengenai kehidupan adik-beradik papin dan peristiwa yang menyebabkan mereka naik ke kemasyhuran yang teruk..."

text: it 's not nearly as fresh or enjoyable as its predecessor , but there are enough high points to keep this from being a complete waste of time .
translation: Ia tidak sesegar atau menyeronokkan sepertimana yang dulu, tetapi terdapat beberapa titik terang yang mencukupi untuk mengelakkan ini daripada menjadi satu pembaziran masa yang lengkap.

text: the movie does n't add anything fresh to the myth .

text: a rote exercise in both animation and storytelling .
translation: latihan mekanikal dalam animasi dan penceritaan.

text: in his latest effort , storytelling , solondz has finally made a movie that is n't just offensive -- it also happens to be good .
translation: Dalam usahanya yang terbaru, penceritaan, Solondz akhirnya membuat filem yang tidak hanya mengguris hati - ia juga baik.
back_translation: In his latest venture, storytelling, Solondz has finally made a film that not only wounds the heart - it is also good.

text: enough is not a bad movie , just mediocre .
translation: Cukup tidaklah sebuah filem yang teruk, hanya sederhana sahaja.

text: a smart , sassy and exceptionally charming romantic comedy .
translation: Sebuah komedi romantis yang pintar, cerdas, dan sangat memikat.
back_translation: A smart, clever, and very charming romantic comedy.

text: stuffy , full of itself , morally ambiguous and nothing to shout about .
translation: Membingungkan, penuh diri, bermoral samar, dan tiada yang istimewa.
back_translation: Confusing, self-centered, morally ambiguous, and nothing special.

text: reyes ' directorial debut has good things to offer , but ultimately it 's undone by a sloppy script
translation: Debut pengarah Reyes mempunyai perkara yang baik untuk ditawarkan, tetapi akhirnya terbantut oleh skrip yang kurang kemas.
back_translation: Director Reyes' debut has good things to offer, but is ultimately hindered by a messy script.

text: it wears its heart on the sleeve of its gaudy hawaiian shirt .
translation: Ia memamerkan hatinya di lengan kemejanya yang berwarna-warni Hawaii yang mencolok.

translation: Ia merupakan persembahan yang spektakular - ahem, kami harap ini hanya lakonan sahaja.

text: ... the film 's considered approach to its subject matter is too calm and thoughtful for agitprop , and the thinness of its characterizations makes it a failure as straight drama . '
translation: Pendekatan yang dianggap oleh filem terhadap subjeknya terlalu tenang dan berfikiran untuk agitprop, dan ketipisan watak-wataknya menjadikannya gagal sebagai drama langsung.
back_translation: The approach taken by the film towards its subject is deemed too calm and geared towards agitprop, and the shallowness of its characters makes it fail as a direct drama.

text: symbolically , warm water under a red bridge is a celebration of feminine energy , a tribute to the power of women to heal .
translation: Secara simbolik, air panas di bawah jambatan merah adalah perayaan tenaga feminin, suatu penghormatan kepada kuasa wanita untuk menyembuhkan.

text: you come away from his film overwhelmed , hopeful and , perhaps paradoxically , illuminated .
translation: Anda keluar dari filemnya terkesan, penuh harapan, dan mungkin secara paradoks, diterangi.

text: equlibrium could pass for a thirteen-year-old 's book report on the totalitarian themes of 1984 and farenheit 451 .
translation: "Equlibrium boleh lulus sebagai laporan buku seorang remaja berumur tiga belas tahun tentang tema totaliteran dalam novel 1984 dan Farenheit 451."

text: a film of delicate interpersonal dances .
translation: filem yang penuh dengan tarian interpersonal yang halus.

text: -lrb- westbrook -rrb- makes a wonderful subject for the camera .
translation: Westbrook merupakan subjek yang indah untuk kamera.

text: cusack 's just brilliant in this .
translation: cusack 's sungguh hebat dalam ini.

text: what a bewilderingly brilliant and entertaining movie this is .
translation: Betapa menakjubkan dan menghibur filem ini.

text: never lets go your emotions , taking them to surprising highs , sorrowful lows and hidden impulsive niches ... gorgeous , passionate , and at times uncommonly moving .
translation: Jangan pernah lepaskan emosi anda, membawa mereka ke puncak yang mengejutkan, rasa sedih yang mendalam, dan tempat-tempat impulsif yang tersembunyi... indah, penuh semangat, dan kadang-kadang sangat menyentuh.
back_translation: Never let go of your emotions, taking them to surprising heights, deep-seated sadness, and hidden impulsive places... beautiful, full of spirit, and sometimes very touching.

text: few films have captured the chaos of an urban conflagration with such fury , and audience members will leave feeling as shaken as nesbitt 's cooper looks when the bullets stop flying .
translation: Beberapa filem telah menggambarkan kekacauan kebakaran bandar dengan amarah yang sedemikian, dan penonton akan berangkat dengan perasaan terguncang seperti wajah tegang Cooper oleh Nesbitt apabila peluru berhenti terbang.
back_translation: Several films have depicted the chaos of urban fires with such fury, and viewers will depart with a shaken feeling, much like Cooper's tense face when the bullets finally stop flying.

text: ferrara 's best film in years .
translation: Filem terbaik Ferrara dalam beberapa tahun.

text: we have poignancy jostling against farce , thoughtful dialogue elbowed aside by one-liners , and a visual style that incorporates rotoscope animation for no apparent reason except , maybe , that it looks neat .
translation: kita mempunyai kesedihan bertembung dengan faris, dialog berfikir didorong tersisih oleh satu baris lucu, dan gaya visual yang menggabungkan animasi rotoscope tanpa sebab yang jelas melainkan, mungkin, ia kelihatan kemas.

text: watching war photographer , you come to believe that nachtwey hates the wars he shows and empathizes with the victims he reveals .

translation: Kebanyakan pengguna lo mein dan ayam tso 's umumnya tidak memikirkan orang-orang yang menyediakannya dan menghantarnya, jadi, semoga filem ini dapat memberikan wajah manusia kepada semua kotak-kotak kecil yang berbau harum itu.
back_translation: Most users of lo mein and General Tso's chicken generally do not think about the people who prepare and deliver it, so, hopefully, this film can give a human face to all those little fragrant boxes.

text: even in terms of the low-grade cheese standards on which it operates , it never quite makes the grade as tawdry trash .

text: the nicest thing that can be said about stealing harvard -lrb- which might have been called freddy gets molested by a dog -rrb- is that it 's not as obnoxious as tom green 's freddie got fingered .

back_translation: The best thing that can be said about "Stealing Harvard" (also possibly called "Freddy Got Fingered by a Dog") is that it is not as bad as the movie "Freddy Got Fingered" by Tom Green.

text: ill-considered , unholy hokum .
translation: Pertimbangan yang tidak matang, hokum yang tidak suci.

text: it 's just merely very bad .

translation: Filem tentang budaya kita yang diinfantilkan yang tidak sepenuhnya infantil.

text: rymer does n't trust laughs -- and does n't conjure proper respect for followers of the whole dead-undead genre , who deserve more from a vampire pic than a few shrieky special effects .

back_translation: Rymer does not believe in laughter - and does not generate the proper respect for fans of the near-dead genre, who deserve more than just a few surprising effects from vampire films.

text: trying to make head or tail of the story in the hip-hop indie snipes is enough to give you brain strain -- and the pay-off is negligible .

text: the film does give a pretty good overall picture of the situation in laramie following the murder of matthew shepard .

text: this rich , bittersweet israeli documentary , about the life of song-and-dance-man pasach ` ke burstein and his family , transcends ethnic lines .
translation: Filem dokumentari Israel yang kaya dan pahit ini, mengenai kehidupan Pasach 'ke Burstein, lelaki penyanyi dan penari, bersama keluarganya, melampaui sempadan etnik.

text: boll uses a lot of quick cutting and blurry step-printing to goose things up , but dopey dialogue and sometimes inadequate performances kill the effect .

text: exactly what its title implies : lusty , boisterous and utterly charming .

text: cherish is a dud -- a romantic comedy that 's not the least bit romantic and only mildly funny .
translation: Cherish adalah satu filem komedi romantis yang tidak romantis langsung dan hanya sedikit lucu.

text: heartwarming here relies less on forced air than on petter næss ' delicate , clever direction ... and a wonderful , imaginative script by axel hellstenius .

back_translation: The heartwarming aspect here is less reliant on forced air than on the subtle and wise direction by Petter Næss... and the beautiful and imaginative script by Axel Hellstenius.

text: with its paint fights , motorized scooter chases and dewy-eyed sentiment , it 's a pretty listless collection of kid-movie clichés .

text: based on dave barry 's popular book of the same name , the movie benefits from having a real writer plot out all of the characters ' moves and overlapping story .

back_translation: Based on the same popular book by Dave Barry, the film benefited from having a real writer planning all the character movements and intertwining plotlines.

text: what 's missing is what we call the ` wow ' factor .
translation: Apa yang kurang ialah apa yang kita panggil faktor 'wow'.

translation: Biasanya, filem-file berbicara Rohmer memukau saya, tetapi apabila dia mengubah latar belakang kepada zaman lampau, dan bergantung kepada teks sejarah, dia kehilangan kekayaan pencirian yang membuat filem-filenya begitu berkesan.

text: you watch for that sense of openness , the little surprises .

text: the abiding impression , despite the mild hallucinogenic buzz , is of overwhelming waste -- the acres of haute couture ca n't quite conceal that there 's nothing resembling a spine here .

text: i approached the usher and said that if she had to sit through it again , she should ask for a raise .
translation: Saya mendekati penunjuk jalan dan berkata bahawa jika dia terpaksa duduk di situ lagi, dia patut meminta kenaikan gaji.

text: it makes you believe the cast and crew thoroughly enjoyed themselves and believed in their small-budget film .

text: the film is enriched by an imaginatively mixed cast of antic spirits , headed by christopher plummer as the subtlest and most complexly evil uncle ralph i 've ever seen in the many film and stage adaptations of the work .

text: these three films form a remarkably cohesive whole , both visually and thematically , through their consistently sensitive and often exciting treatment of an ignored people .
translation: Tiga filem ini membentuk satu kesatuan yang padu, sama ada dari segi visual mahupun tema, melalui cara mereka yang sentiasa peka dan sering kali menghiburkan dalam mengendalikan kisah rakyat yang sering diabaikan.
back_translation: These three films form a cohesive unit, both visually and thematically, through their sensitive and oftentimes entertaining approach in handling folk tales that are often overlooked.

text: smart and alert , thirteen conversations about one thing is a small gem .

text: its audacious ambitions sabotaged by pomposity , steven soderbergh 's space opera emerges as a numbingly dull experience .

text: even if the enticing prospect of a lot of nubile young actors in a film about campus depravity did n't fade amid the deliberate , tiresome ugliness , it would be rendered tedious by avary 's failure to construct a story with even a trace of dramatic interest .
translation: Walaupun prospek menarik pelakon muda yang banyak dalam filem tentang kejahilan kampus tidak pudar di tengah-tengah keburukan yang disengajakan dan menjemukan, tetapi ini dibuat membosankan oleh kegagalan Avary untuk membina cerita yang mempunyai sejengkal minat dramatik.

text: it goes on for too long and bogs down in a surfeit of characters and unnecessary subplots .

text: give shapiro , goldman , and bolado credit for good intentions , but there 's nothing here that they could n't have done in half an hour .

text: if the real-life story is genuinely inspirational , the movie stirs us as well .

text: disturbing .

text: it 's hard to pity the ` plain ' girl who becomes a ravishing waif after applying a smear of lip-gloss .

text: why anyone who is not a character in this movie should care is beyond me .

text: the movie 's major and most devastating flaw is its reliance on formula , though , and it 's quite enough to lessen the overall impact the movie could have had .
translation: Kekurangan utama dan paling merugikan filem itu adalah kebergantungannya pada formula, namun, dan sudah cukup untuk mengurangkan kesan keseluruhan yang filem itu sebenarnya boleh capai.

text: it is depressing , ruthlessly pained and depraved , the movie equivalent of staring into an open wound .

text: a comedy-drama of nearly epic proportions rooted in a sincere performance by the title character undergoing midlife crisis .
translation: sebuah komedi-drama dengan proporsi hampir epik yang berakar dalam persembahan tulus oleh watak utama yang sedang mengalami krisis pertengahan usia.

text: ... contains very few laughs and even less surprises .

text: earnest and heartfelt but undernourished and plodding .
translation: Serius dan tulus tetapi kurang gizi dan monoton.

text: a dull , somnambulant exercise in pretension whose pervasive quiet is broken by frequent outbursts of violence and noise .
translation: Latihan yang membosankan, somnambulistik dalam pretensi yang sunyi yang sering diganggu oleh letupan kekerasan dan bunyi.
