translation: Ini adalah filem Star Trek terbaik dalam waktu yang lama.
back_translation: This is the best Star Trek movie in a long time.

text: a remarkably alluring film set in the constrictive eisenhower era about one suburban woman 's yearning in the face of a loss that shatters her cheery and tranquil suburban life .
translation: Sebuah filem yang sangat memikat yang bertempat dalam era eisenhower yang membataskan tentang kerinduan seorang wanita bandar dalam menghadapi kehilangan yang menggoncang kehidupan bandar ceria dan tenangnya.
back_translation: A very captivating film set in the Eisenhower era that tells of a city woman's longing in facing a loss that shakes the vibrant and calm city life.

text: instead of simply handling conventional material in a conventional way , secretary takes the most unexpected material and handles it in the most unexpected way .
translation: Daripada hanya mengendalikan bahan konvensional dengan cara konvensional, setiausaha mengambil bahan yang paling tidak dijangka dan mengendalikannya dengan cara yang paling tidak dijangka.
back_translation: Instead of just handling conventional materials in a conventional manner, the secretary takes the most unexpected materials and handles them in the most unexpected way.

text: a winning comedy with its wry observations about long-lived friendships and the ways in which we all lose track of ourselves by trying to please others .
translation: Sebuah komedi yang memenangkan hati dengan pengamatannya yang sinis tentang persahabatan jangka panjang dan cara-cara di mana kita semua kehilangan diri kita dengan cuba menyenangkan orang lain.
back_translation: A comedy that wins hearts with its cynical observations on long-term friendship and the ways in which we all lose ourselves by trying to please others.

text: writer-director randall wallace has bitten off more than he or anyone else could chew , and his movie veers like a drunken driver through heavy traffic .
translation: Penulis-pengarah Randall Wallace telah mengambil terlalu banyak tanggungjawab, dan filemnya melencun seperti pemandu yang mabuk melalui kesesakan lalu lintas.
back_translation: Writer-director Randall Wallace has taken on too much responsibility, and his film slips like a drunk driver through traffic congestion.

text: like kissing jessica stein , amy 's orgasm has a key strength in its willingness to explore its principal characters with honesty , insight and humor .
translation: Seperti mencium Jessica Stein, orgasme Amy mempunyai kekuatan utama dalam kesanggupannya untuk meneroka watak-watak utamanya dengan jujur, wawasan, dan humor.

text: an edifying glimpse into the wit and revolutionary spirit of these performers and their era .
translation: satu pandangan yang mendidik tentang kecerdikan dan semangat revolusioner para artis dan zaman mereka.

text: starts promisingly but disintegrates into a dreary , humorless soap opera .

text: the touch is generally light enough and the performances , for the most part , credible .

text: it is sentimental but feels free to offend , is analytical and then surrenders to the illogic of its characters , is about grief and yet permits laughter .

text: howard and his co-stars all give committed performances , but they 're often undone by howard 's self-conscious attempts to find a ` literary ' filmmaking style to match his subject .

text: the actors must indeed be good to recite some of this laughable dialogue with a straight face .

text: imagine a film that begins as a seven rip-off , only to switch to a mix of the shining , the thing , and any naked teenagers horror flick from the 1980s .
translation: Bayangkan filem yang bermula sebagai tiruan tujuh, tetapi kemudiannya bertukar kepada campuran The Shining, The Thing, dan filem seram remaja bogel dari tahun 1980-an.

translation: Tanpa suntikan kreativiti yang segar, selamanya bukanlah janji ataupun ancaman sebaliknya lebih kepada impian yang berangan-angan.

text: this humbling little film , fueled by the light comedic work of zhao benshan and the delicate ways of dong jie , is just the sort for those moviegoers who complain that ` they do n't make movies like they used to anymore . '

text: overall tomfoolery like this is a matter of taste .

translation: Kita sudah melihat semuanya sebelum ini dalam satu bentuk atau yang lain, tetapi pengarah Hoffman, dengan bantuan hebat dari Kevin Kline, membuat kita peduli tentang inkarnasi terkini dari guru terhebat dunia ini.

text: easily the most thoughtful fictional examination of the root causes of anti-semitism ever seen on screen .
translation: Pemeriksaan rekaan fiksyen yang paling berfikiran tentang punca asal anti-Semitisme yang pernah dilihat di layar.

text: despite suffering a sense-of-humour failure , the man who wrote rocky does not deserve to go down with a ship as leaky as this .

text: the film is filled with humorous observations about the general absurdity of modern life as seen through the eyes outsiders , but deftly manages to avoid many of the condescending stereotypes that so often plague films dealing with the mentally ill .
translation: Filem ini dipenuhi dengan pemerhatian lucu tentang ketidakwarasan umum kehidupan moden yang dilihat melalui mata orang luar, tetapi berjaya mengelak dari banyak stereotaip merendahkan yang sering mengganggu filem yang mengendalikan orang yang mengalami gangguan mental.

translation: Pengkhianat tidak dapat memikirkan apa yang harus dilakukan dengan watak-watak ini selain membuat mereka berlari melalui terowong gelap, melawan pelbagai penyerang yang tidak dikenali, dan mengelakkan teknologi pengawasan yang rumit.

translation: Walaupun filem ini mempunyai pelakon-pelakon 'A-list' dan beberapa pelakon pembantu yang kuat, ceritanya - seperti tokoh utamanya, Vivi - agak sukar untuk disayangi.

text: zoom !

translation: Ia merupakan tanda buruk apabila anda mendoakan filem itu segera berakhir dengan kematian subjeknya, hanya untuk menamatkan dokumentari itu, tetapi itu menggambarkan betapa tidak menariknya filem tersebut kecuali jika ia merangkumi bidang minat anda.

translation: Sukar untuk membayangkan sesiapa yang pernah merasa "dalam mood" untuk menonton filem sekeras dan menyedihkan seperti The Grey Zone, tetapi juga sukar untuk membayangkan sesiapa yang boleh melepaskan mata mereka dari skrin setelah filem bermula.
back_translation: It's hard to imagine anyone ever feeling "in the mood" to watch a hard-hitting and somber film like The Grey Zone, but it's also tough to imagine anyone being able to tear their eyes away from the screen once the film starts.

text: it gives devastating testimony to both people 's capacity for evil and their heroic capacity for good .

text: makes one thing abundantly clear .

text: not a schlocky creature feature but something far more stylish and cerebral -- and , hence , more chillingly effective .

text: after a while , hoffman 's quirks and mannerisms , particularly his penchant for tearing up on cue -- things that seem so real in small doses -- become annoying and artificial .
translation: Selepas beberapa lama, kelakar dan kelakuan unik Hoffman, terutamanya kegemarannya untuk menangis dengan cepat - perkara yang kelihatan begitu nyata dalam dos kecil - menjadi menjengkelkan dan tiruan.

text: it 's not like having a real film of nijinsky , but at least it 's better than that eponymous 1980 biopic that used soap in the places where the mysteries lingered .
translation: Ini bukan seperti memiliki filem sebenar Nijinsky, tetapi setidak-tidaknya lebih baik daripada filem biopik 1980 yang disebut namanya yang menggunakan sabun di tempat-tempat di mana misterinya bertahan.

text: the only surprise is that heavyweights joel silver and robert zemeckis agreed to produce this ; i assume the director has pictures of them cavorting in ladies ' underwear .
translation: Satu-satunya kejutan ialah pengarah berat Joel Silver dan Robert Zemeckis bersetuju untuk menghasilkan ini; Saya anggap pengarah itu mempunyai gambar mereka bergembira dalam pakaian dalam wanita.
back_translation: The only surprise is heavyweight directors Joel Silver and Robert Zemeckis agreeing to produce this; I imagine the directors have their pictures happy in women's underwear.

translation: Sebuah alegori mengenai isu sinyal bercampur yang sering dialami oleh para profesional Afrika Amerika berkaitan dengan keberhasilan berlebihan boleh menjadi menarik, tetapi hiasan supranatural hanya memperumitkan mesejnya.

text: an incredibly irritating comedy about thoroughly vacuous people ... manages to embody the worst excesses of nouvelle vague without any of its sense of fun or energy .

text: the movie itself is far from disappointing , offering an original take on courtroom movies , a few nifty twists that are so crucial to the genre and another first-rate performance by top-billed star bruce willis .
translation: Filem itu sendiri jauh dari mengecewakan, menawarkan pandangan asli pada filem mahkamah, beberapa putaran yang bijak yang sangat penting untuk genre tersebut dan persembahan bertaraf pertama lagi oleh bintang utama Bruce Willis.
back_translation: The movie itself is far from disappointing, offering a fresh perspective on courtroom films, some clever twists that are crucial to the genre, and a top-notch performance once again by the lead star Bruce Willis.

text: norton is magnetic as graham .
translation: norton adalah sebagaimana magnetik seperti graham.

text: the year 's greatest adventure , and jackson 's limited but enthusiastic adaptation has made literature literal without killing its soul -- a feat any thinking person is bound to appreciate .

back_translation: The greatest adventure of the year, and Jackson's limited yet passionate adaptation has made literature come alive without killing its soul - an achievement that is surely appreciated by everyone who thinks.

text: a remarkable movie with an unsatisfying ending , which is just the point .

text: mr. goyer 's loose , unaccountable direction is technically sophisticated in the worst way .
translation: Pengarah yang longgar dan tidak bertanggungjawab oleh Encik Goyer adalah secara teknikal canggih dalam cara yang terburuk.

text: a weird little movie that 's amusing enough while you watch it , offering fine acting moments and pungent insights into modern l.a. 's show-biz and media subcultures .
translation: Filem kecil yang aneh tetapi cukup menghibur ketika ditonton, menawarkan momen lakonan yang baik dan pandangan yang tajam tentang subkultur show-bisnes dan media moden di L.A.

translation: Mencuri harvard akan melucutkan dompet anda, merampas 90 minit masa anda, dan menawarkan anda tepat ini sebagai pampasan: beberapa gelak awal tersebar di sekitar plot yang nipis dan berulang-ulang.

text: sex is one of those films that aims to confuse .

text: first-time director joão pedro rodrigues ' unwillingness to define his hero 's background or motivations becomes more and more frustrating as the film goes on .

text: salma goes native and she 's never been better in this colorful bio-pic of a mexican icon .
translation: Salma menjadi 'native' dan dia tidak pernah lebih baik dalam filem biografi berwarna-warni mengenai ikon Mexico ini.

text: human nature is a goofball movie , in the way that malkovich was , but it tries too hard .

text: the asylum material is gripping , as are the scenes of jia with his family .

text: a literary detective story is still a detective story and aficionados of the whodunit wo n't be disappointed .
translation: Sebuah cerita detektif yang memiliki unsur kesusastraan tetap merupakan sebuah cerita detektif dan para penggemar misteri siapa pelakunya tidak akan kecewa.

text: the soundtrack alone is worth the price of admission .

text: it sounds like another clever if pointless excursion into the abyss , and that 's more or less how it plays out .
translation: Ia seakan satu lagi usaha bijak yang tidak bermakna ke dalam kegelapan, dan begitulah lebih kurang bagaimana cerita berakhir.
back_translation: It's like another futile attempt into darkness, and that's more or less how the story ends.

text: the film has the high-buffed gloss and high-octane jolts you expect of de palma , but what makes it transporting is that it 's also one of the smartest , most pleasurable expressions of pure movie love to come from an american director in years .
translation: Filem ini mempunyai kilauan yang berseri-seri dan ketukan bertenaga tinggi yang anda jangkakan dari de Palma, tetapi apa yang membuatnya berbeza ialah ia juga merupakan salah satu ungkapan cinta filem yang paling bijak dan paling memuaskan yang datang daripada pengarah Amerika dalam beberapa tahun.
back_translation: This film has the dazzling sparkle and high-powered rhythm you would expect from de Palma, but what sets it apart is that it is also one of the smartest and most satisfying cinematic expressions of love to come from an American director in years.

text: sly , sophisticated and surprising .
translation: Licik, berkelas dan mengejutkan.

text: -lrb- kline 's -rrb- utterly convincing -- and deeply appealing -- as a noble teacher who embraces a strict moral code , and as a flawed human being who ca n't quite live up to it .
translation: Kline sungguh meyakinkan - dan sangat menarik - sebagai seorang guru mulia yang merangkul satu kod moral yang ketat, dan sebagai seorang manusia yang cacat yang tidak dapat sepenuhnya memenuhi kod tersebut.
back_translation: Kline is truly convincing - and very intriguing - as a noble teacher who embraces a strict moral code, and as a flawed human who cannot fully fulfill that code.

text: more trifle than triumph .

text: it 's hard to believe these jokers are supposed to have pulled off four similar kidnappings before .

text: murphy and wilson actually make a pretty good team ... but the project surrounding them is distressingly rote .

text: the screenplay , co-written by director imogen kimmel , lacks the wit necessary to fully exploit the comic elements of the premise , making the proceedings more bizarre than actually amusing .

text: i hope the movie is widely seen and debated with appropriate ferocity and thoughtfulness .
translation: Saya harap filem itu dilihat secara meluas dan diperdebatkan dengan keganasan yang sesuai dan pemikiran yang mendalam.

text: she may not be real , but the laughs are .

text: clumsy , obvious , preposterous , the movie will likely set the cause of woman warriors back decades .

text: scherfig 's light-hearted profile of emotional desperation is achingly honest and delightfully cheeky .

text: you can sip your vintage wines and watch your merchant ivory productions ; i 'll settle for a nice cool glass of iced tea and a jerry bruckheimer flick any day of the week .

text: both garcia and jagger turn in perfectly executed and wonderfully sympathetic characters , who are alternately touching and funny .

text: many went to see the attraction for the sole reason that it was hot outside and there was air conditioning inside , and i do n't think that a.c. will help this movie one bit .

text: not everyone will welcome or accept the trials of henry kissinger as faithful portraiture , but few can argue that the debate it joins is a necessary and timely one .

text: there is no substitute for on-screen chemistry , and when friel pulls the strings that make williams sink into melancholia , the reaction in williams is as visceral as a gut punch .

text: there are some fairly unsettling scenes , but they never succeed in really rattling the viewer .

text: there is simply no doubt that this film asks the right questions at the right time in the history of our country .

text: what the audience feels is exhaustion , from watching a movie that is dark -lrb- dark green , to be exact -rrb- , sour , bloody and mean .

text: mr. polanski is in his element here : alone , abandoned , but still consoled by his art , which is more than he has ever revealed before about the source of his spiritual survival .

text: a devastating indictment of unbridled greed and materalism .

back_translation: While insomnia is quite common with many explanations, even predictable scheduling, Nolan's deep undercurrents and semantic dexterity provide stimulating depth.

text: undoubtedly the scariest movie ever made about tattoos .
translation: Tanpa ragu, filem paling menakutkan yang pernah dihasilkan tentang tatu.

text: ian holm conquers france as an earthy napoleon
translation: Ian Holm menakluki Perancis sebagai Napoleon yang sederhana

text: tykwer 's surface flash is n't just a poor fit with kieslowski 's lyrical pessimism ; it completely contradicts everything kieslowski 's work aspired to , including the condition of art .
translation: Kilau permukaan Tykwer bukan sahaja tidak sesuai dengan pesimisme lirikal Kieslowski; ia bertentangan sepenuhnya dengan segala-galanya yang dicita-citakan oleh karya Kieslowski, termasuk keadaan seni.
back_translation: The surface brilliance of Tykwer is not only incongruent with Kieslowski's lyrical pessimism; it is entirely at odds with everything envisioned by Kieslowski's work, including the state of art.

text: -lrb- creates -rrb- the worst kind of mythologizing , the kind that sacrifices real heroism and abject suffering for melodrama .
translation: Mencipta mitos terburuk, yang mengorbankan kepahlawanan sebenar dan penderitaan yang menyayat hati demi melodrama.

text: director tom shadyac and star kevin costner glumly mishandle the story 's promising premise of a physician who needs to heal himself .

text: a tremendous piece of work .
translation: Sebuah karya yang sangat hebat.

text: a pretty funny movie , with most of the humor coming , as before , from the incongruous but chemically perfect teaming of crystal and de niro .

text: there 's something poignant about an artist of 90-plus years taking the effort to share his impressions of life and loss and time and art with us .
translation: Ada sesuatu yang menyentuh hati tentang seorang seniman berusia 90 tahun ke atas yang mengambil kesempatan untuk berkongsi kesan hidup, kehilangan, masa, dan seni dengan kita.

text: our culture is headed down the toilet with the ferocity of a frozen burrito after an all-night tequila bender -- and i know this because i 've seen ` jackass : the movie . '
translation: Budaya kita sedang menuju ke arah yang teruk dengan hebatnya seperti burrito beku selepas mabuk tequila sepanjang malam - dan saya tahu ini kerana saya telah menonton ' Jackass: filem itu.'
back_translation: Our culture is heading towards a disaster with the magnitude of a frozen burrito after a night of tequila binge - and I know this because I've watched 'Jackass: the movie.'

text: moonlight mile does n't quite go the distance but the cast is impressive and they all give life to these broken characters who are trying to make their way through this tragedy .

back_translation: Moonlight Mile did not quite reach the desired distance, but its cast is amazing and they all bring to life the shattered characters trying to face this tragedy.

text: american and european cinema has amassed a vast holocaust literature , but it is impossible to think of any film more challenging or depressing than the grey zone .
translation: Filem Amerika dan Eropah telah mengumpulkan sebuah kumpulan karya sastera holokaus yang sangat luas, tetapi mustahil untuk membayangkan filem yang lebih mencabar atau mendepresi daripada Zon Kelabu.
back_translation: American and European films have gathered a wide collection of Holocaust literary works, but it is impossible to imagine a more challenging or depressing film than The Grey Zone.

text: the script is too mainstream and the psychology too textbook to intrigue .

text: if you recognize zeus -lrb- the dog from snatch -rrb- it will make you wish you were at home watching that movie instead of in the theater watching this one .

back_translation: If you recognize Zeus (the dog from Snatch), it will make you wish you were at home watching that movie instead of in the theater watching this movie.

text: though nijinsky 's words grow increasingly disturbed , the film maintains a beguiling serenity and poise that make it accessible for a non-narrative feature .

text: parker updates the setting in an attempt to make the film relevant today , without fully understanding what it was that made the story relevant in the first place .

translation: Filem ini mungkin tidak mempunyai nilai produksi yang tertinggi yang pernah anda lihat, tetapi ia adalah hasil kerja seorang seniman, seseorang yang pandangannya terhadap Amerika, sejarah dan kekacauan kehidupan manusia adalah luas dan mendalam.

text: brings together some of the biggest names in japanese anime , with impressive results .

text: woefully pretentious .

text: -lrb- leigh -rrb- has a true talent for drawing wrenching performances from his actors -lrb- improvised over many months -rrb- and for conveying the way tiny acts of kindness make ordinary life survivable .

text: an effective portrait of a life in stasis -- of the power of inertia to arrest development in a dead-end existence .

text: the subtitled costume drama is set in a remote african empire before cell phones , guns , and the internal combustion engine , but the politics that thump through it are as timely as tomorrow .
translation: Drama kostum yang diselitkan ini berlatar belakang di sebuah empayar Afrika yang terpencil sebelum telefon bimbit, senjata api, dan enjin pembakaran dalam, tetapi politik yang tercetus di dalamnya begitu relevan seperti esok hari.

text: instead of contriving a climactic hero 's death for the beloved-major - character-who-shall - remain-nameless , why not invite some genuine spontaneity into the film by having the evil aliens ' laser guns actually hit something for once ?

text: brown sugar signals director rick famuyiwa 's emergence as an articulate , grown-up voice in african-american cinema .

text: its one-sidedness ... flirts with propaganda .

text: a processed comedy chop suey .

text: part of the charm of satin rouge is that it avoids the obvious with humour and lightness .
translation: Sebahagian daripada keunikan satin rouge adalah kerana ia mengelakkan yang jelas dengan humor dan kesantainan.

text: its story about a young chinese woman , ah na , who has come to new york city to replace past tragedy with the american dream is one that any art-house moviegoer is likely to find compelling .
translation: Kisah tentang seorang wanita Cina muda, Ah Na, yang datang ke bandar New York untuk menggantikan tragedi masa lalu dengan impian Amerika adalah sesuatu yang akan menarik perhatian penonton filem seni suara.
back_translation: The story of a young Chinese woman, Ah Na, who comes to the city of New York to replace her past tragedy with the American dream is something that will captivate the audience of an independent film.

text: great performances , stylish cinematography and a gritty feel help make gangster no. 1 a worthwhile moviegoing experience .

text: there 's absolutely no reason why blue crush , a late-summer surfer girl entry , should be as entertaining as it is
translation: Tidak ada sebab sama sekali mengapa Blue Crush, filem surfer girl lewat musim panas, sepatutnya sehibur yang sekarang.

text: mike leigh populates his movie with a wonderful ensemble cast of characters that bring the routine day to day struggles of the working class to life
translation: Mike Leigh mengisi filemnya dengan barisan pelakon yang hebat yang membawa cabaran-cabaran seharian rutin kelas pekerja menjadi hidup.

text: contains a few big laughs but many more that graze the funny bone or miss it altogether , in part because the consciously dumbed-down approach wears thin .

text: more of the same from taiwanese auteur tsai ming-liang , which is good news to anyone who 's fallen under the sweet , melancholy spell of this unique director 's previous films .

text: this familiar rise-and-fall tale is long on glamour and short on larger moralistic consequences , though it 's told with sharp ears and eyes for the tenor of the times .

back_translation: Although this widescreen is vast and caricatured, there is a precision of observation in the work of director Frank Novak, which makes this film stand in undeniable social realism.

text: its use of the thriller form to examine the labyrinthine ways in which people 's lives cross and change , buffeted by events seemingly out of their control , is intriguing , provocative stuff .

text: some of the most ravaging , gut-wrenching , frightening war scenes since `` saving private ryan '' have been recreated by john woo in this little-known story of native americans and their role in the second great war .

text: it 's too harsh to work as a piece of storytelling , but as an intellectual exercise -- an unpleasant debate that 's been given the drive of a narrative and that 's been acted out -- the believer is nothing less than a provocative piece of work .

back_translation: It is too harsh to work as part of a story, but as an intellectual exercise - an unpleasant debate that drives the narrative and is performed - adherents see it as nothing less than a provocative work.

translation: Kebanyakan maklumat tersebut telah muncul dalam satu forum atau yang lain, dan walaupun betapa Broomfield cuba menghiasnya, ia cenderung kepada spekulasi, teori konspirasi, atau, sekurang-kurangnya, bukti berdasarkan keadaan tertentu.

text: consider the film a celluloid litmus test for the intellectual and emotional pedigree of your date and a giant step backward for a director i admire .

text: imagine -lrb- if possible -rrb- a pasolini film without passion or politics , or an almodovar movie without beauty or humor , and you have some idea of the glum , numb experience of watching o fantasma .
translation: Bayangkan sebuah filem Pasolini tanpa gairah atau politik, atau filem Almodovar tanpa kecantikan atau humornya, dan anda akan mempunyai sedikit gambaran tentang pengalaman murung dan mati rasa menonton o fantasma.

text: when the screenwriter responsible for one of the worst movies of one year directs an equally miserable film the following year , you 'd have a hard time believing it was just coincidence .
translation: Apabila penulis skrip yang bertanggungjawab untuk salah satu filem terburuk pada satu tahun mengarahkan filem yang sama teruknya pada tahun berikutnya, anda akan sukar percaya bahawa itu hanyalah kebetulan.
back_translation: When the scriptwriter responsible for one of the worst films in a year directs an equally bad film the following year, you would find it hard to believe that it is just a coincidence.

text: the entire movie establishes a wonderfully creepy mood .

back_translation: Director Elie Chouraqui, who also wrote the script, captures the chaos and fear of war, but why struggle if you're ultimately going to submit the truth to the demands of soap opera tear-jerking drama?

text: this is a movie so insecure about its capacity to excite that it churns up not one but two flagrantly fake thunderstorms to underscore the action .

translation: Evelyn mungkin berdasarkan kisah sebenar dan bersejarah yang penting, tetapi para pembuat filem telah berusaha sebaik mungkin untuk menyamarinya sebagai ciptaan penulis skrin yang kurang kreatif.
back_translation: Evelyn is likely based on a true and important historical story, but filmmakers have tried their best to disguise it as the creation of a less creative screenwriter.

text: characterisation has been sacrificed for the sake of spectacle .
translation: Pembangunan watak telah dikorbankan demi pengejutan.
back_translation: Character development has been sacrificed for surprises.

text: it turns out to be smarter and more diabolical than you could have guessed at the beginning .
translation: Ternyata ia lebih bijak dan jahat daripada yang anda sangka pada mulanya.
back_translation: It turns out that he is wiser and more evil than you initially thought.

text: is significantly less charming than listening to a four-year-old with a taste for exaggeration recount his halloween trip to the haunted house .
translation: Jauh lebih menarik daripada mendengar cerita seorang kanak-kanak berusia empat tahun yang gemar melebih-lebihkan menceritakan lawatannya ke rumah berhantu.

text: an example of quiet , confident craftsmanship that tells a sweet , charming tale of intergalactic friendship .
translation: contoh hasil kerja yang tenang dan yakin yang menceritakan kisah persahabatan antaragalaksi yang manis dan menawan.

text: cheap , vulgar dialogue and a plot that crawls along at a snail 's pace .
translation: Dialog yang murah, kasar dan plot yang bergerak lambat seperti siput.
back_translation: Cheap dialogue, rough and slow-moving plot like a snail.

text: been there done that .
translation: Pernah berada di situ dan melakukannya.
back_translation: I have been there and done that.

text: something has been lost in the translation ... another routine hollywood frightfest in which the slack execution italicizes the absurdity of the premise .
translation: Ada sesuatu yang hilang dalam terjemahan... satu lagi rutin hiburan menakutkan Hollywood di mana pelaksanaannya yang lemah menegaskan ketidak masuk akalannya.
back_translation: There is something missing in the translation... another routine of scary Hollywood entertainment where its weak execution emphasizes its absurdity.

text: tense , terrific , sweaty-palmed fun .
translation: sukar, hebat, menyeronokkan yang membuatkan tapak tangan berpeluh.

text: despite some charm and heart , this quirky soccer import is forgettable
translation: Walaupun ada daya tarikan dan kehangatan, import bola sepak yang aneh ini mudah dilupakan.

text: cuaron repeatedly , perversely undercuts the joie de vivre even as he creates it , giving the movie a mournful undercurrent that places the good-time shenanigans in welcome perspective .
translation: cuaron berulang kali, dengan penuh keanehan merendahkan semangat kehidupan walaupun dia menciptakannya, memberikan filem sentimen berkabung yang meletakkan kegiatan yang menyeronokkan dengan perspektif yang baik.
back_translation: Cuaron repeatedly, with full strangeness, diminishes the spirit of life even though he created it, providing a mournful sentiment film that puts enjoyable activities in a good perspective.

text: for all its brooding quality , ash wednesday is suspenseful and ultimately unpredictable , with a sterling ensemble cast .
translation: Walaupun berkualiti dalam kepekatan emosinya, hari rabu abu adalah mendebarkan dan pada akhirnya tidak dapat diramalkan, dengan pelakon ansambel yang cemerlang.

text: delivers the sexy razzle-dazzle that everyone , especially movie musical fans , has been hoping for .
translation: menghadirkan kemewahan menarik yang seksi yang semua orang, terutamanya peminat muzikal filem, telah berharap.

text: -- that the ` true story ' by which all the queen 's men is allegedly `` inspired '' was a lot funnier and more deftly enacted than what 's been cobbled together onscreen .
translation: -- bahawa 'cerita benar' yang menjadi asas kepada kisah semua lelaki ratu itu kononnya "terinspirasi" jauh lebih lucu dan dijalankan dengan lebih mahir daripada apa yang dirangka di layar.
back_translation: -- the 'true story' that served as the basis for the tale of all the queen's men is supposedly "inspired" to be much funnier and executed more skillfully than what was crafted on screen.

text: you could hate it for the same reason .
translation: Anda boleh benci itu atas sebab yang sama.
back_translation: You can hate it for the same reason.

translation: Sebuah cerita mengenai pelajar sekolah menengah yang bijak yang mengendalikan cinta pertama dengan manis tetapi juga secara serius.
back_translation: A story about a wise high school student who handles first love sweetly but also seriously.

text: waydowntown may not be an important movie , or even a good one , but it provides a nice change of mindless pace in collision with the hot oscar season currently underway .
translation: Waydowntown mungkin bukan filem yang penting, atau bahkan yang baik, tetapi ia memberikan perubahan yang menyegarkan dari kelajuan tanpa fikiran bertembung dengan musim Oscar yang hangat yang sedang berlangsung.

text: `` frailty '' starts out like a typical bible killer story , but it turns out to be significantly different -lrb- and better -rrb- than most films with this theme .
translation: 'Kerapuhan' bermula seperti sebuah cerita pembunuh ala Bible biasa, tetapi ia berbeza - dan lebih baik - daripada kebanyakan filem dengan tema ini.

text: thanks to the château 's balance of whimsicality , narrative discipline and serious improvisation , almost every relationship and personality in the film yields surprises .
translation: Terima kasih kepada keseimbangan whimsicality, disiplin naratif, dan improvisasi yang serius di château, hampir setiap hubungan dan personaliti dalam filem itu memberikan kejutan.
back_translation: Thanks to the balance of whimsicality, narrative discipline, and serious improvisation at the château, almost every relationship and personality in the film offers surprises.

text: gaghan captures the half-lit , sometimes creepy intimacy of college dorm rooms , a subtlety that makes the silly , over-the-top coda especially disappointing .
translation: gaghan menangkap intimasi separuh terang, kadang-kadang menyeramkan di bilik asrama kolej, satu kehalusan yang membuat epilog yang bodoh dan berlebihan terasa sangat mengecewakan.
back_translation: Capturing the intimate half-light, sometimes eerie in the college dorm room, a subtlety that makes the overly dramatic and silly epilogue feel very disappointing.

text: julie davis is the kathie lee gifford of film directors , sadly proving once again ego does n't always go hand in hand with talent .
translation: Julie Davis adalah Kathie Lee Gifford dalam dunia pengarah filem, dengan sedih membuktikan sekali lagi bahawa ego tidak selalu berkait rapat dengan bakat.
back_translation: Julie Davis is Kathie Lee Gifford in the world of film directing, sadly proving once again that ego is not always closely related to talent.

text: in the affable maid in manhattan , jennifer lopez 's most aggressive and most sincere attempt to take movies by storm , the diva shrewdly surrounds herself with a company of strictly a-list players .
translation: Dalam filem maid yang mesra di Manhattan, Jennifer Lopez melancarkan usaha paling agresif dan paling ikhlas untuk menarik perhatian dalam dunia filem, penyanyi ternama ini dengan bijak mengelilingi dirinya dengan kumpulan pemain a-list yang terpilih.
back_translation: In the movie Maid in Manhattan, Jennifer Lopez launched the most aggressive and sincere effort to attract attention in the film world, this famous singer wisely surrounded herself with a selected group of A-list players.

text: elegantly produced and expressively performed , the six musical numbers crystallize key plot moments into minutely detailed wonders of dreamlike ecstasy .
translation: Diproduksi dengan elegan dan dilakukan dengan penuh ekspresi, enam nombor muzik mengkristal kan momen plot utama menjadi keajaiban berincian halus dari ekstasi seperti dalam mimpi.
back_translation: Produced elegantly and performed with full expression, the six musical numbers crystallize the main plot moments into a delicate wonder of ecstasy as if in a dream.

text: dark and unrepentant , this excursion into the epicenter of percolating mental instability is not easily dismissed or forgotten .
translation: gelap dan tidak bertobat, pengembaraan ini ke pusat ketidakstabilan mental yang sedang berputar tidak mudah dilupakan atau diabaikan.

text: solondz may be convinced that he has something significant to say , but he is n't talking a talk that appeals to me .
translation: Solondz mungkin yakin bahawa beliau ada sesuatu yang penting untuk disampaikan, tetapi dia tidak menyampaikan sesuatu yang menarik bagi saya.
back_translation: Solondz may believe that he has something important to convey, but he did not deliver anything interesting to me.

text: a beautifully shot but dull and ankle-deep ` epic . '
translation: Suatu epik yang diambil dengan indah tetapi hambar dan dangkal.

text: stale , futile scenario .
translation: senario yang basi dan sia-sia.

translation: Filem dalam kelas dengan kehebatan arahan Spike Lee 'Do the Right Thing'.

text: in addition to sporting one of the worst titles in recent cinematic history , ballistic : ecks vs. sever also features terrible , banal dialogue ; convenient , hole-ridden plotting ; superficial characters and a rather dull , unimaginative car chase .
translation: Selain mempunyai salah satu tajuk terburuk dalam sejarah filem baru-baru ini, ballistic: ecks vs. sever juga memaparkan dialog yang teruk dan membosankan; plot yang penuh dengan kelemahan; watak yang sekadar berpada-pada dan satu perlawanan kereta yang agak membosankan dan kurang kreatif.
back_translation: In addition to having one of the worst titles in recent film history, ballistic: ecks vs. sever also features terrible and boring dialogue; a plot filled with weaknesses; characters that are mediocre at best, and a rather uncreative and dull car chase sequence.

text: full of the kind of obnoxious chitchat that only self-aware neurotics engage in .
translation: Penuh dengan perbualan tak bermakna yang hanya diambil tahu oleh neurotik yang sedar diri.

text: a simpler , leaner treatment would have been preferable ; after all , being about nothing is sometimes funnier than being about something .
translation: Satu rawatan yang lebih ringkas dan padat akan lebih diutamakan; bagaimanapun, tentang tiada apa-apa kadang-kadang lebih lucu daripada tentang sesuatu.

text: kirshner and monroe seem to be in a contest to see who can out-bad-act the other .

text: the only reason you should see this movie is if you have a case of masochism and an hour and a half to blow .
translation: Satu-satunya alasan anda patut menonton filem ini ialah jika anda mengalami masokisme dan mempunyai masa sejam setengah untuk dibazirkan.

text: it 's pretentious in a way that verges on the amateurish .
translation: Ia bersifat angkuh dengan gaya yang hampir mendekati pemula.

text: a plodding teen remake that 's so mechanical you can smell the grease on the plot twists .
translation: Remake remaja yang membosankan yang begitu mekanikal sehingga anda boleh mencium minyak pada plot twist.

text: it 's drab .
translation: Ini membosankan.

translation: ... sebuah komedi yang tidak dapat diramalkan dengan penuh kegembiraan, lucu dengan lakonan yang hebat yang mencuit hati anda dengan cara yang benar-benar melampaui label jantina.

text: in my own very humble opinion , in praise of love lacks even the most fragmented charms i have found in almost all of his previous works .
translation: Menurut pendapat saya yang amat merendah, dalam pujian terhadap cinta, kekurangan daya tarikan yang sangat terfragmentasi yang saya temui dalam hampir semua karya-karya beliau sebelum ini.
back_translation: In my humble opinion, in praising love, there is a lack of a very fragmented attraction that I found in almost all of his previous works.

text: i 've never bought from telemarketers , but i bought this movie .
translation: Saya tidak pernah membeli dari jurujual telefon, tetapi saya membeli filem ini.

text: woven together handsomely , recalling sixties ' rockumentary milestones from lonely boy to do n't look back .

text: horrid little propaganda film with fascinating connections not only to the serbs themselves but also to a network of american right-wing extremists .

text: a sun-drenched masterpiece , part parlor game , part psychological case study , part droll social satire .

text: a thriller without thrills and a mystery devoid of urgent questions .
translation: Sebuah cerita seram tanpa ketegangan dan sebuah misteri tanpa soalan yang mendesak.

text: 10 minutes into the film you 'll be white-knuckled and unable to look away .
translation: 10 minit dalam filem tersebut, anda akan memegang erat tangan dan tidak dapat berpaling.

text: an enjoyable above average summer diversion .

text: violent , vulgar and forgettably entertaining .
translation: Keganasan, kotoran, dan menghibur tanpa memberi kesan.

text: like many such biographical melodramas , it suffers from the awkwardness that results from adhering to the messiness of true stories .
translation: Seperti banyak melodrama biografi lain, filem ini mengalami kekakuan yang berpunca daripada mematuhi kekacauan dalam kisah benar.

translation: Sebagai sebuah cerita pencerahan dramatik, skrinplay oleh Billy Ray dan Terry George meninggalkan sesuatu yang diingini.

text: sometimes charming , sometimes infuriating , this argentinean ` dramedy ' succeeds mainly on the shoulders of its actors .
translation: Kadang-kadang memikat, kadang-kadang menjengkelkan, 'dramedi' Argentina ini berjaya terutamanya melalui penampilan pelakonnya.

text: `` 13 conversations about one thing '' is an intelligent flick that examines many different ideas from happiness to guilt in an intriguing bit of storytelling .
translation: "13 perbualan tentang satu perkara" adalah filem yang bijak yang menyiasat pelbagai idea dari kebahagiaan hingga rasa bersalah dalam sebuah cerita yang menarik.

text: all in all , road to perdition is more in love with strangeness than excellence .
translation: Secara keseluruhan, "Road to Perdition" lebih jatuh cinta dengan keanehan daripada keunggulan.
back_translation: Overall, "Road to Perdition" falls more in love with oddity than excellence.

text: with all the sympathy , empathy and pity fogging up the screen ... his secret life enters the land of unintentional melodrama and tiresome love triangles .
translation: Dengan segala simpati, empati, dan belas kasihan yang memenuhi skrin ... kehidupan rahsia nya masuk ke tanah melodrama tidak sengaja dan segitiga cinta yang menjemukan.
back_translation: With all the sympathy, empathy, and compassion filling the screen ... his secret life entered the accidental melodramatic land and tedious love triangle.

text: like a fish that 's lived too long , austin powers in goldmember has some unnecessary parts and is kinda wrong in places .
translation: Seperti seekor ikan yang telah hidup terlalu lama, Austin Powers dalam Goldmember mempunyai beberapa bahagian yang tidak perlu dan agak salah di beberapa tempat.

text: adaptation 's success in engaging the audience in the travails of creating a screenplay is extraordinary .
translation: Kejayaan adaptasi dalam menarik perhatian penonton dalam ranjau-ranjau mencipta skrinplay adalah luar biasa.
back_translation: The success of adaptation in capturing the audience's attention in creating screenplays is outstanding.

text: canadian filmmaker gary burns ' inventive and mordantly humorous take on the soullessness of work in the city .
translation: Pengarah filem Kanada Gary Burns memberikan pendekatan yang kreatif dan penuh humor sinis mengenai ketiadaan jiwa dalam dunia pekerjaan di bandar.
back_translation: Canadian filmmaker Gary Burns takes a creative and humorously cynical approach to the lack of soul in the urban work world.

text: ultimately , `` mib ii '' succeeds due to its rapid-fire delivery and enough inspired levity that it ca n't be dismissed as mindless .
translation: Pada akhirnya, "MiB II" berjaya kerana penghantaran pantasnya dan keceriaan yang cukup terinspirasi sehingga tidak boleh diabaikan sebagai tanpa fikiran.

text: like the original , this version is raised a few notches above kiddie fantasy pablum by allen 's astringent wit .
translation: Seperti asalnya, versi ini ditingkatkan beberapa tahap di atas fantasi kanak-kanak biasa dengan kecerdikan tajam Allen.
back_translation: As before, this version is elevated several levels above the ordinary childhood fantasy with Allen's sharp wit.

text: tries so hard to be quirky and funny that the strain is all too evident .
translation: Cuba sangat gigih untuk menjadi eksentrik dan lucu hingga tekanan itu jelas terlihat.
back_translation: Try very hard to be eccentric and funny until the pressure is clearly visible.

text: the self-serious equilibrium makes its point too well ; a movie , like life , is n't much fun without the highs and lows .
translation: keseimbangan serius diri tersebut membuat hujahnya terlalu baik; sebuah filem, seperti kehidupan, tidak begitu menyeronokkan tanpa naik turun.
back_translation: The serious balance of self makes his argument too good; a film, like life, is not so enjoyable without ups and downs.

text: a family film that contains some hefty thematic material on time , death , eternity , and what is needed to live a rich and full life .
translation: Filem keluarga yang mengandungi beberapa bahan tema yang penting mengenai masa, kematian, keabadian, dan apa yang diperlukan untuk menjalani kehidupan yang kaya dan penuh.
back_translation: A family movie containing several important themes about time, death, eternity, and what is needed to live a rich and fulfilling life.

text: a riveting profile of law enforcement , and a visceral , nasty journey into an urban hades .
translation: profil yang mendebarkan tentang penguatkuasa undang-undang, dan perjalanan yang terasa daging ke dalam neraka bandar.
back_translation: A thrilling profile about law enforcement officers, and a journey that feels like flesh into the urban hell.

text: by no means a great movie , but it is a refreshingly forthright one .
translation: Bukan filem yang hebat sama sekali, tetapi filem ini memang jujur dan menyegarkan.
back_translation: Not a great movie at all, but this film is indeed honest and refreshing.

text: rewarding .
translation: berbaloi.
back_translation: Worth it.

text: often hilarious .
translation: Seringkali lucu.
back_translation: Often funny.

text: shot largely in small rooms , the film has a gentle , unforced intimacy that never becomes claustrophobic .
translation: Dikecam terutamanya dalam bilik kecil , filem ini mempunyai keterikatan yang lembut dan tidak dipaksa yang tidak pernah menjadi sesak.
back_translation: Critically acclaimed, especially in the small room, this film carries a gentle and unforced connection that never feels suffocating.

text: i like all four of the lead actors a lot and they manage to squeeze a few laughs out of the material , but they 're treading water at best in this forgettable effort .
translation: Saya sangat suka keempat-empat pelakon utama dan mereka berjaya menghasilkan beberapa gelak ketawa dari bahan tersebut, tetapi mereka hanya berada pada tahap biasa dalam usaha yang terlupakan ini.
back_translation: I really like all four main actors and they successfully produced some laughs from the material, but they were only at an average level in this forgotten effort.

text: the adventure does n't contain half the excitement of balto , or quarter the fun of toy story 2 .
translation: Pengembaraan itu tidak mengandungi separuh keghairahan Balto, atau seperempat keseronokan Toy Story 2.
back_translation: The adventure did not contain half the excitement of Balto, or a quarter of the fun of Toy Story 2.

text: a very charming and funny movie .
translation: Filem yang sangat menawan dan lucu.
back_translation: A very captivating and funny movie.

text: nair 's attention to detail creates an impeccable sense of place , while thurman and lewis give what can easily be considered career-best performances .
translation: Perhatian nair terhadap butiran mencipta rasa tempat yang tidak terbanding, sementara thurman dan lewis memberikan persembahan yang boleh dianggap sebagai yang terbaik dalam kerjaya mereka.
back_translation: Attention to detail creates an unparalleled sense of place, while Thurman and Lewis's performances can be considered the best in their careers.

text: ... the maudlin way its story unfolds suggests a director fighting against the urge to sensationalize his material .
translation: ... cara sedih bagaimana ceritanya berkembang menunjukkan seorang pengarah yang berjuang menentang keinginan untuk membesar-besarkan bahan bacaannya.

text: beware the quirky brit-com .
translation: Berhati-hati dengan brit-kom yang aneh.
back_translation: Be cautious of weird online comments.

text: a sense of real magic , perhaps .
translation: Suasana magis yang sebenar, mungkin.
back_translation: The real magical atmosphere, perhaps.

text: no , i do n't know why steven seagal is considered a star , nor why he keeps being cast in action films when none of them are ever any good or make any money .
translation: Saya tidak tahu mengapa Steven Seagal dianggap sebagai seorang bintang, atau mengapa dia terus dibuang dalam filem-filem aksi padahal tidak satupun daripada filem-filem tersebut baik atau mendapat keuntungan.

text: if s&m seems like a strange route to true love , maybe it is , but it 's to this film 's -lrb- and its makers ' -rrb- credit that we believe that that 's exactly what these two people need to find each other -- and themselves .
translation: Jika s&m kelihatan seperti laluan yang aneh untuk cinta sejati, mungkin memang begitu, tetapi adalah jasa filem ini -dan pembikinnya- bahawa kita percaya itulah sebenarnya apa yang diperlukan kedua-dua individu ini untuk menjumpai satu sama lain - dan diri mereka sendiri.
back_translation: If s&m seems like a strange path to true love, perhaps it is, but it is the merit of this film - and its creators - that we believe it is actually what these two individuals need to find each other - and themselves.

text: one of those decades-spanning historical epics that strives to be intimate and socially encompassing but fails to do justice to either effort in three hours of screen time .
translation: Satu dari epik sejarah yang merentang beberapa dekad yang cuba untuk menjadi rapat dan menyeluruh dari segi sosial tetapi gagal untuk memberikan keadilan kepada kedua-dua usaha dalam tiga jam masa skrin.

text: a huge disappointment coming , as it does , from filmmakers and performers of this calibre

text: richard pryor mined his personal horrors and came up with a treasure chest of material , but lawrence gives us mostly fool 's gold .

text: a movie of riveting power and sadness .

text: the new insomnia is a surprisingly faithful remake of its chilly predecessor , and when it does elect to head off in its own direction , it employs changes that fit it well rather than ones that were imposed for the sake of commercial sensibilities .
translation: Insomnia baru ini adalah sebuah pembaharuan yang menarik dan setia terhadap filem asal yang sejuk, dan apabila ia memilih untuk bergerak dalam arahnya sendiri, ia menggunakan perubahan yang sesuai dengan baik daripada yang dipaksakan semata-mata kerana kepekaan komersial.

text: just offbeat enough to keep you interested without coming close to bowling you over .
translation: Cukup berbeza untuk menarik minat anda tanpa hampir melanda anda.

text: written , flatly , by david kendall and directed , barely , by there 's something about mary co-writer ed decter .

text: it 's a film with an idea buried somewhere inside its fabric , but never clearly seen or felt .

text: one can only assume that the jury who bestowed star hoffman 's brother gordy with the waldo salt screenwriting award at 2002 's sundance festival were honoring an attempt to do something different over actually pulling it off
translation: Seseorang hanya boleh menganggap bahawa juri yang menganugerahkan anugerah penulisan skrip Waldo Salt kepada adik Star Hoffman, Gordy, di Festival Sundance 2002 sedang menghormati percubaan untuk melakukan sesuatu yang berbeza daripada melakukannya dengan baik.
back_translation: One can only assume that the jury awarding the Waldo Salt Screenwriting Award to Star Hoffman's brother, Gordy, at the 2002 Sundance Festival is honoring an attempt to do something different rather than just doing it well.

text: seeks to transcend its genre with a curiously stylized , quasi-shakespearean portrait of pure misogynist evil .
translation: berusaha melampaui genre-nya dengan potret kejahatan misoginis murni yang aneh tetapi bergaya, hampir seperti Shakespeare.

text: not a stereotype is omitted nor a cliché left unsaid .

text: it 's coherent , well shot , and tartly acted , but it wears you down like a dinner guest showing off his doctorate .

text: -lrb- a -rrb- stale retread of the '53 original .

text: is a question for philosophers , not filmmakers ; all the filmmakers need to do is engage an audience .
