text: ritchie 's film is easier to swallow than wertmuller 's polemical allegory , but it 's self-defeatingly decorous .
translation: Filem karya Ritchie lebih mudah diterima daripada alegori polemik Wertmuller, tetapi ia menghilangkan keberkesanan secara sendiri dengan terlalu sopan.
back_translation: Ritchie's films are more easily accepted than Wertmuller's polemic allegories, but they lose their effectiveness on their own by being too polite.

text: the charm of the first movie is still there , and the story feels like the logical , unforced continuation of the careers of a pair of spy kids .
translation: Pesona filem pertama masih ada, dan ceritanya terasa seperti kelangsungan karier sepasang kanak-kanak pengintip yang logik dan tidak dipaksa.
back_translation: The charm of the first film still exists, and its story feels like the continuation of a pair of rational and unforced child spies' careers.

text: purports to be a hollywood satire but winds up as the kind of film that should be the target of something deeper and more engaging .
translation: Dikatakan sebagai satu satira Hollywood tetapi akhirnya berubah menjadi filem yang sepatutnya menjadi sasaran sesuatu yang lebih mendalam dan menarik.
back_translation: It was initially labeled as a Hollywood satire but eventually evolved into a film that should have been the target of something deeper and more engaging.

text: any enjoyment will be hinge from a personal threshold of watching sad but endearing characters do extremely unconventional things .
translation: Sebarang keseronokan akan bergantung pada ambang peribadi untuk menonton watak sedih tetapi menarik melakukan perkara yang sangat tidak biasa.
back_translation: Any pleasure will depend on the personal threshold to watch sad yet intriguing characters do highly unusual things.

text: an undeniably gorgeous , terminally smitten document of a troubadour , his acolytes , and the triumph of his band .
translation: sebuah dokumen yang sangat cantik, terpesona secara terminal tentang seorang ahli lagu, para pengikutnya, dan kemenangan bandnya.
back_translation: A beautifully crafted document, entranced thoroughly by a song expert, their followers, and their band's victories.

text: halfway through the movie , the humor dwindles .
translation: Setengah jalan dalam filem tersebut, humornya berkurang.
back_translation: Halfway through the movie, the humor decreases.

text: the magic -lrb- and original running time -rrb- of ace japanimator hayao miyazaki 's spirited away survives intact in bv 's re-voiced version .
translation: Kerja ajaib dari pengarah Jepun Hayao Miyazaki, Spirited Away, masih kekal utuh dalam versi yang di-vois semula oleh BV.
back_translation: The magical work by Japanese director Hayao Miyazaki, Spirited Away, still remains intact in the dubbed version by BV.

text: michael moore has perfected the art of highly entertaining , self-aggrandizing , politically motivated documentary-making , and he 's got as potent a topic as ever here .
translation: Michael Moore telah mempertingkatkan seni membuat dokumentari yang sangat menghibur, membesarkan diri sendiri, dan berorientasi politik, dan dia mempunyai topik yang sama kuatnya seperti sebelum ini di sini.
back_translation: Michael Moore has elevated the art of creating highly entertaining, self-aggrandizing, and politically oriented documentaries, and he has just as powerful topics as before.

text: frei assembles a fascinating profile of a deeply humanistic artist who , in spite of all that he 's witnessed , remains surprisingly idealistic , and retains an extraordinary faith in the ability of images to communicate the truth of the world around him .
translation: Frei menyusun profil yang memikat mengenai seorang artis yang sangat humanistik yang, walaupun telah menyaksikan segala sesuatu, tetap mempertahankan sikap idealisme yang mengejutkan, dan mempunyai keyakinan luar biasa dalam kemampuan imej untuk menyampaikan kebenaran dunia di sekelilingnya.
back_translation: Frei crafts a captivating profile about a highly humanistic artist who, despite having witnessed everything, still holds onto a surprising idealistic attitude, and possesses an extraordinary belief in the power of imagery to convey the truths of the world around them.

text: predictable and cloying , though brown sugar is so earnest in its yearning for the days before rap went nihilistic that it summons more spirit and bite than your average formulaic romantic quadrangle .
translation: Mudah ditebak dan lemah , walaupun gula perang berusaha dengan sungguh-sungguh untuk zaman sebelum rap menjadi nihilistik sehingga ia mengundang lebih semangat dan rasa daripada romansa segi empat biasa.
back_translation: Predictable and weak, even though brown sugar tries hard to be surreal in an age before rap became nihilistic, it invites more spirit and taste than just the usual square romance.

text: sadly , though many of the actors throw off a spark or two when they first appear , they ca n't generate enough heat in this cold vacuum of a comedy to start a reaction .
translation: Sayangnya, walaupun ramai pelakon melepaskan percikan sedikit apabila mereka muncul pertama kali, mereka tidak mampu menghasilkan cukup haba dalam komedi yang sejuk ini untuk memulakan tindak balas.
back_translation: Unfortunately, despite many actors giving off a spark when they first appear, they are unable to generate enough heat in this lukewarm comedy to initiate a response.

text: such a bad movie that its luckiest viewers will be seated next to one of those ignorant pinheads who talk throughout the show .
translation: Filem yang begitu teruk sehingga penonton yang bertuah akan duduk bersebelahan dengan salah seorang daripada golongan pinheads yang tidak mengerti dan bercakap sepanjang pertunjukan.
back_translation: The movie was so bad that the lucky audience would end up sitting next to one of the pinheads who didn't understand and kept talking throughout the show.

text: a modest masterpiece .
translation: sebuah karya agung yang sederhana.
back_translation: A simple masterpiece.

text: neil burger here succeeded in ... making the mystery of four decades back the springboard for a more immediate mystery in the present .
translation: Neil Burger berjaya dalam... menjadikan misteri empat dekad yang lalu sebagai titik tolak untuk misteri yang lebih mendesak pada masa kini.
back_translation: Neil Burger succeeds in... using a four-decade-old mystery as a starting point for a more urgent mystery in the present.

text: and thanks to kline 's superbly nuanced performance , that pondering is highly pleasurable .
translation: Dan berkat persembahan yang sangat halus daripada kline, sesuatu untuk dipertimbangkan itu sangat menyeronokkan.
back_translation: And thanks to the very fine presentation from the client, it is something to consider that is very enjoyable.

text: it 's still a comic book , but maguire makes it a comic book with soul .
translation: Ini masih sebuah buku komik, tetapi Maguire menjadikannya sebuah buku komik yang mempunyai jiwa.
back_translation: It's still a comic book, but Maguire has turned it into a comic book with a soul.

text: shiri is an action film that delivers on the promise of excitement , but it also has a strong dramatic and emotional pull that gradually sneaks up on the audience .
translation: Shiri adalah filem aksi yang memberikan kepuasan keseronokan, tetapi juga mempunyai daya tarikan dramatik dan emosi yang kuat yang secara perlahan-lahan memikat penonton.
back_translation: "Shiri is an action film that provides satisfying enjoyment, but also has a strong dramatic and emotional pull that slowly captivates the audience."

text: seems content to dog-paddle in the mediocre end of the pool , and it 's a sad , sick sight .
translation: Nampaknya puas untuk berenang gaya anjing di bahagian kolam yang sederhana, dan ini adalah pemandangan yang sedih dan tidak sihat.
back_translation: It seems satisfying to swim doggy paddle in the shallow part of the pool, and this is a sad and unhealthy sight.

text: takes a fresh and absorbing look at a figure whose legacy had begun to bronze .
translation: Melihat semula dengan segar dan mendalam pada sebuah tokoh yang warisannya mulai menjadi perunggu.
back_translation: Looking again freshly and deeply at a figure whose legacy is beginning to turn into bronze.

text: but it does n't leave you with much .
translation: tetapi itu tidak memberi anda banyak.
back_translation: but that doesn't give you much.

text: the trick when watching godard is to catch the pitch of his poetics , savor the pleasure of his sounds and images , and ponder the historical , philosophical , and ethical issues that intersect with them .
translation: Tip ketika menonton filem Godard adalah untuk menangkap nada puisinya, menikmati kenikmatan bunyi dan imejnya, dan merenungkan isu-isu sejarah, falsafah, dan etika yang bertemu dengannya.
back_translation: The tip when watching Godard's films is to grasp the tone of his poetry, enjoy the pleasure of its sound and images, and reflect on the historical, philosophical, and ethical issues that intersect with it.

text: broomfield has a rather unique approach to documentary .
translation: Broomfield mempunyai pendekatan yang agak unik terhadap dokumentari.
back_translation: Broomfield has a rather unique approach to documentaries.

text: as the mediterranean sparkles , ` swept away ' sinks .
translation: Sementara Mediterranean berkilauan, 'swept away' tenggelam.
back_translation: While the Mediterranean sparkled, 'swept away' sank.

text: two-bit potboiler .
translation: Novel rendah mutu.
back_translation: Low-quality novel.

text: a poignant and gently humorous parable that loves its characters and communicates something rather beautiful about human nature .
translation: sebuah perumpamaan yang menyentuh dan sedikit lucu yang menyayangi karakter-karakternya dan menyampaikan sesuatu yang agak indah tentang sifat manusia.
back_translation: A touching and slightly funny metaphor that endears its characters and conveys something quite beautiful about human nature.

text: a smart , provocative drama that does the nearly impossible : it gets under the skin of a man we only know as an evil , monstrous lunatic .
translation: sebuah drama yang bijak, menimbulkan pertanyaan yang hampir mustahil: ia meresap ke dalam jiwa seorang lelaki yang hanya kita kenal sebagai seorang gila jahat yang mengerikan.
back_translation: A wise drama that raises almost impossible questions: it seeps into the soul of a man we only know as a terrifying madman.

text: at once overly old-fashioned in its sudsy plotting and heavy-handed in its effort to modernize it with encomia to diversity and tolerance .
translation: Pada masa yang sama terlalu kuno dalam plot yang berbuih dan terlalu tegas dalam usahanya untuk memodernkan dengan puji-pujian kepada kepelbagaian dan toleransi.
back_translation: At the same time, it is too old-fashioned in its plot which is overly exaggerated and too forceful in its efforts to modernize with praises for diversity and tolerance.

text: it 's just rather leaden and dull .
translation: Ia agak hambar dan membosankan saja.
back_translation: It is rather dull and boring.

text: problem is , we have no idea what in creation is going on .
translation: Masalahnya, kami tidak memahami apa yang sedang berlaku.
back_translation: The problem is, we do not understand what is happening.

text: the movie is a mess from start to finish .
translation: Filem ini berantakan dari mula hingga tamat.
back_translation: This movie is a mess from beginning to end.

text: its rawness and vitality give it considerable punch .
translation: Ketulinan dan kehidupan memberikan kesan yang kuat.
back_translation: Culture and life have a strong impact.

text: one of the best inside-show-biz yarns ever .
translation: Salah satu kisah dalam dunia hiburan terbaik sepanjang masa.
back_translation: One of the best stories in the world of entertainment of all time.

text: but the feelings evoked in the film are lukewarm and quick to pass .
translation: Namun perasaan yang disebabkan oleh filem itu agak sejuk dan cepat berlalu.
back_translation: However, the feelings caused by the movie are quite cold and quickly fade away.

text: a burst of color , music , and dance that only the most practiced curmudgeon could fail to crack a smile at .
translation: ledakan warna, muzik, dan tarian yang hanya curmudgeon yang paling terlatih boleh gagal untuk tidak tersenyum.
back_translation: An explosion of colors, music, and dance that even the most trained curmudgeon could fail to not smile.

text: the best animated feature to hit theaters since beauty and the beast 11 years ago .
translation: filem animasi terbaik yang muncul di pawagam sejak beauty and the beast 11 tahun yang lalu.
back_translation: the best animation film to hit the theaters since beauty and the beast 11 years ago.

text: the only camouflage carvey should now be considering is a paper bag to wear over his head when he goes out into public , to avoid being recognized as the man who bilked unsuspecting moviegoers .
translation: Satu-satunya perlindungan yang Carvey sepatutnya pertimbangkan sekarang adalah beg kertas yang dipakai di atas kepalanya apabila keluar ke tempat awam, untuk mengelakkan dikenal sebagai lelaki yang menipu penonton filem yang tidak berwaspada.
back_translation: The only protection Carvey should consider now is a paper bag worn over his head when going out in public, to avoid being recognized as the man who deceived inattentive moviegoers.

text: scarcely worth a mention apart from reporting on the number of tumbleweeds blowing through the empty theatres graced with its company .
translation: Hampir tidak bererti disebut selain daripada melaporkan bilangan rumput kering yang berterbangan melalui teater-teater kosong yang dihiasi dengan kehadirannya.
back_translation: It is almost meaningless to be mentioned except for reporting the number of dry grass flying through empty theaters adorned with its presence.

text: a beautifully observed character piece .
translation: sebuah karya karakter yang diamati dengan indah.
back_translation: A beautifully observed character piece.

text: compared to his series of spectacular belly flops both on and off the screen , runteldat is something of a triumph .
translation: Berbanding dengan siri lemparan ke atas dan ke bawah yang spektakuler, runteldat adalah sesuatu yang lebih seperti kemenangan.
back_translation: Compared to the spectacular series of throws up and down, runteldat is something more akin to a victory.

text: as plain and pedestrian as catsup --
translation: biasa dan konvensional seperti katsup --
back_translation: ordinary and conventional like ketchup --

text: some people march to the beat of a different drum , and if you ever wondered what kind of houses those people live in , this documentary takes a look at 5 alternative housing options .
translation: Beberapa orang bergerak seiring irama gendang yang berbeza, dan jika anda pernah tertanya-tanya jenis rumah di mana orang-orang itu tinggal, dokumentari ini mengambil pandangan terhadap 5 pilihan kediaman alternatif.
back_translation: Some people move to the beat of different drums, and if you've ever wondered about the kinds of homes these people live in, this documentary takes a look at 5 alternative housing options.

text: that jack nicholson makes this man so watchable is a tribute not only to his craft , but to his legend .
translation: Bahawa Jack Nicholson menjadikan lelaki ini begitu menarik untuk ditonton adalah penghormatan bukan sahaja kepada bakatnya, tetapi juga kepada reputasinya yang legenda.
back_translation: That Jack Nicholson makes this man so interesting to watch is a tribute not only to his talent, but also to his legendary reputation.

text: with each of her three protagonists , miller eloquently captures the moment when a woman 's life , out of a deep-seated , emotional need , is about to turn onto a different path .
translation: Dengan setiap tiga protagonisnya, Miller dengan berani menangkap saat di mana kehidupan seorang wanita, atas keperluan emosional yang mendalam, akan berpaling ke arah yang berbeza.
back_translation: With each of its three protagonists, Miller boldly captures the moment when a woman's life, driven by deep emotional needs, will turn in a different direction.

text: a college story that works even without vulgarity , sex scenes , and cussing !
translation: Sebuah cerita kolej yang berjaya meskipun tanpa unsur kesat, adegan seks, dan umpatan!
back_translation: A successful college story even without elements of violence, sex scenes, and curses!

text: a loquacious and dreary piece of business .
translation: sebuah potongan urus niaga yang bercakap-cakap dan membosankan.
back_translation: A boring and tedious business transaction.

text: behan 's memoir is great material for a film -- rowdy , brawny and lyrical in the best irish sense -- but sheridan has settled for a lugubrious romance .
translation: Memoir Behan adalah bahan yang hebat untuk filem - kasar, kuat dan lirik dalam erti Irish yang terbaik - tetapi Sheridan telah memilih roman yang melankolik.
back_translation: Behan's memoir is great material for a film - rough, strong, and lyrical in the best Irish sense - but Sheridan has chosen a melancholic novel.

text: a rather tired exercise in nostalgia .
translation: Satu usaha yang agak letih dalam nostalgik.
back_translation: A somewhat tiring effort in nostalgia.

text: ` linklater fans , or pretentious types who want to appear avant-garde will suck up to this project ... '
translation: Peminat Linklater atau individu angkuh yang mahu kelihatan avant-garde akan memuji projek ini...
back_translation: Fans of Linklater or individuals who are pretentious and want to appear avant-garde will praise this project...

text: there 's little to recommend snow dogs , unless one considers cliched dialogue and perverse escapism a source of high hilarity .
translation: Tidak banyak yang boleh disarankan tentang anjing salji, melainkan jika seseorang menganggap dialog klise dan pelarian yang terpesong sebagai sumber tinggi lawak.
back_translation: There is not much to recommend about snow dogs, unless one considers clichéd dialogue and meandering escapes as a source of high comedy.

text: one lousy movie .
translation: satu filem yang teruk.
back_translation: a terrible movie.

text: it 's such a mechanical endeavor -lrb- that -rrb- it never bothers to question why somebody might devote time to see it .
translation: Ia merupakan suatu usaha mekanikal yang tidak pernah mengganggu untuk mempertanyakan mengapa seseorang mungkin meluangkan masa untuk melihatnya.
back_translation: It is a mechanical effort that never fails to question why someone might spend time looking at it.

text: a blair witch - style adventure that plays like a bad soap opera , with passable performances from everyone in the cast .
translation: Petualangan gaya blair witch yang dimainkan seperti opera sabun buruk, dengan persembahan yang boleh diterima dari semua pelakon dalam pelakonan.
back_translation: Blair Witch-style adventure played like a bad soap opera, with acceptable performances from all actors involved.

text: until its final minutes this is a perceptive study of two families in crisis -- and of two girls whose friendship is severely tested by bad luck and their own immaturity .
translation: Sehingga minit terakhir, ini adalah satu kajian yang peka mengenai dua keluarga dalam krisis - dan dua gadis yang persahabatannya diuji secara serius oleh nasib malang dan ketidakhematangan mereka sendiri.
back_translation: Until the last minute, this is a sensitive study of two families in crisis - and two girls whose friendship is seriously tested by their own misfortune and immaturity.

text: abandon spends 90 minutes trying figure out whether or not some cocky pseudo-intellectual kid has intentionally left college or was killed .
translation: Abandon menghabiskan 90 minit cuba mencari tahu sama ada seorang kanak-kanak yang sombong dan berlagak sebagai intelektual telah sengaja meninggalkan kolej atau dibunuh.
back_translation: Abandon spent 90 minutes trying to find out whether an arrogant and pretentious child posing as an intellectual has deliberately left college or been murdered.

text: needs more impressionistic cinematography and exhilarating point-of-view shots and fewer slow-motion ` grandeur ' shots and quick-cut edits that often detract from the athleticism .
translation: Perlu lebih sinematografi impresionistik dan rakaman titik pandangan yang membangkitkan semangat dan kurangkan rakaman 'kegemilangan' perlahan dan suntingan potongan cepat yang sering mengurangkan daya saing atletisme.
back_translation: Need more impressionistic cinematography and perspective shots that evoke spirit and reduce slow-motion 'glory' shots and fast-paced editing which often diminish the competitiveness of athletics.

text: with the prospect of films like kangaroo jack about to burst across america 's winter movie screens it 's a pleasure to have a film like the hours as an alternative .
translation: Dengan prospek filem seperti kangaroo jack yang bakal melanda pawagam filem musim sejuk di Amerika, adalah suatu keseronokan untuk mempunyai filem seperti The Hours sebagai alternatif.
back_translation: With movie prospects like Kangaroo Jack set to dominate the winter movie theaters in America, it is a pleasure to have a film like The Hours as an alternative.

text: where this was lazy but enjoyable , a formula comedy redeemed by its stars , that is even lazier and far less enjoyable .
translation: Di mana ini adalah malas tetapi menyeronokkan, sebuah komedi formula yang diperbaharui oleh pelakon-pelakonnya, yang jauh lebih malas dan kurang menyeronokkan.
back_translation: Where this is lazy but fun, a comedy formula renewed by its actors, who are much lazier and less fun.

text: a highly watchable , giggly little story with a sweet edge to it .
translation: Satu cerita yang sangat menyeronokkan, lucu, dengan elemen manis di dalamnya.
back_translation: A very enjoyable, funny story with sweet elements in it.

text: skillfully weaves both the elements of the plot and a powerfully evocative mood combining heated sexuality with a haunting sense of malaise .
translation: dengan mahir merentangkan elemen plot dan mencipta mood yang kuat dengan menggabungkan seksualiti yang membara dengan rasa malaise yang menghantui.
back_translation: skillfully spreading plot elements and creating a strong mood by combining burning sexuality with haunting malaise.

text: -lrb- soderbergh -rrb- tends to place most of the psychological and philosophical material in italics rather than trust an audience 's intelligence , and he creates an overall sense of brusqueness .
translation: Soderbergh cenderung meletakkan sebahagian besar bahan psikologi dan falsafah dalam italik daripada mempercayai kecerdasan penonton, dan beliau mencipta satu kesan keseriusan keseluruhan.
back_translation: Soderbergh tends to put most of the psychological and philosophical material in italics rather than trusting the audience's intelligence, creating an overall impression of seriousness.

text: writer-director juan carlos fresnadillo makes a feature debut that is fully formed and remarkably assured .
translation: Pengarah penulis Juan Carlos Fresnadillo membuat sebuah lakonan ciri yang sudah matang dan amat yakin.
back_translation: Writer-director Juan Carlos Fresnadillo has created a feature film that is mature and very confident.

text: the kind of film that leaves you scratching your head in amazement over the fact that so many talented people could participate in such an ill-advised and poorly executed idea .
translation: Jenis filem yang membuat anda menggaru kepala anda dengan kagum atas kenyataan bahawa begitu ramai orang berbakat boleh mengambil bahagian dalam idea yang terburuk dan terlaksana dengan buruk sedemikian.
back_translation: The type of movie that makes you scratch your head in awe at the fact that so many talented people could be involved in such a bad idea and execute it so poorly.

text: each story is built on a potentially interesting idea , but the first two are ruined by amateurish writing and acting , while the third feels limited by its short running time .
translation: Setiap cerita dibina atas idea yang berpotensi menarik, tetapi dua yang pertama dirosakkan oleh penulisan dan lakonan amatur, manakala yang ketiga terasa terhad dengan masa berlari singkatnya.
back_translation: Every story is built on potentially interesting ideas, but the first two are ruined by amateur writing and acting, while the third feels rushed due to its short running time.

text: sweetly sexy , funny and touching .
translation: Manis, seksi, lucu, dan menyentuh.
back_translation: Sweet, sexy, funny, and touching.

text: like all of egoyan 's work , ararat is fiercely intelligent and uncommonly ambitious .
translation: Seperti semua hasil kerja Egoyan, Ararat sangat bijak dan luar biasa ambisius.
back_translation: Like all of Egoyan's works, Ararat is very intelligent and incredibly ambitious.

text: even if invincible is not quite the career peak that the pianist is for roman polanski , it demonstrates that werner herzog can still leave us with a sense of wonder at the diverse , marvelously twisted shapes history has taken .
translation: Walaupun "Invincible" tidak seterkenal "The Pianist" bagi Roman Polanski, ia menunjukkan bahawa Werner Herzog masih boleh memberikan kita perasaan keajaiban terhadap pelbagai bentuk sejarah yang meruncing dan mengagumkan.
back_translation: Although "Invincible" may not be as popular as "The Pianist" for Roman Polanski, it shows that Werner Herzog can still give us a sense of wonder towards various forms of history that are poignant and awe-inspiring.

text: the film is really closer to porn than a serious critique of what 's wrong with this increasingly pervasive aspect of gay culture .
translation: Filem itu lebih cenderung kepada pornografi daripada kritikan serius terhadap apa yang salah dengan aspek gaya hidup gay yang semakin meresap ini.
back_translation: The film leans more towards pornography rather than serious critique of what is wrong with the increasingly pervasive gay lifestyle.

text: this is a movie that starts out like heathers , then becomes bring it on , then becomes unwatchable .
translation: Ini filem yang bermula seperti heathers, kemudian menjadi bring it on, kemudian menjadi sukar untuk ditonton.
back_translation: This movie starts off like Heathers, then becomes Bring It On, and then becomes hard to watch.

text: it 's a cool event for the whole family .
translation: Ini adalah satu acara yang menarik untuk keseluruhan keluarga.
back_translation: This is an exciting event for the whole family.

text: time literally stops on a dime in the tries-so-hard-to-be-cool `` clockstoppers , '' but that does n't mean it still wo n't feel like the longest 90 minutes of your movie-going life .
translation: Masa benar-benar berhenti seketika dalam filem "clockstoppers" yang cuba keras untuk menjadi keren, tetapi itu tidak bermakna ia masih tidak akan terasa seperti 90 minit yang paling panjang dalam hidup anda menonton filem.
back_translation: Time truly stops for a moment in the film "Clockstoppers" trying hard to be cool, but that doesn't mean it still won't feel like the longest 90 minutes of your life watching a movie.

text: a beautiful , entertaining two hours .
translation: Dua jam yang indah dan menghibur.
back_translation: Two hours that are beautiful and entertaining.

text: though it pretends to expose the life of male hustlers , it 's exploitive without being insightful .
translation: Walaupun ia seolah-olah mendedahkan kehidupan pelacur lelaki, ia adalah eksploitasi tanpa memberi pandangan yang mendalam.
back_translation: Although it seems to expose the life of male prostitutes, it is an exploitation without providing in-depth views.

text: too long , and larded with exposition , this somber cop drama ultimately feels as flat as the scruffy sands of its titular community .
translation: Terlalu panjang, dan penuh dengan penjelasan, drama polis yang suram ini pada akhirnya terasa datar seperti pasir kasar dari komunitasnya yang dijadikan tajuk.
back_translation: Too long, and full of explanations, this bleak police drama ultimately feels as flat as the rough sand from the community it is titled after.

text: another love story in 2002 's remarkable procession of sweeping pictures that have reinvigorated the romance genre .
translation: cerita cinta lain dalam prosesi gambar yang luas pada tahun 2002 yang telah menyegarkan semula genre romantik.
back_translation: Another love story in the vast landscape of films in 2002 that has refreshed the romantic genre.

text: the chateau belongs to rudd , whose portrait of a therapy-dependent flakeball spouting french malapropisms ... is a nonstop hoot .
translation: Chateau tersebut milik Rudd, yang potretnya tentang seorang yang bergantung pada terapi dan mengucapkan kesalahan kata dalam bahasa Perancis... sungguh menggelitik.
back_translation: The chateau belongs to Rudd, whose portrait of someone relying on therapy and uttering words of apology in French is truly provocative.

text: the story ... is inspiring , ironic , and revelatory of just how ridiculous and money-oriented the record industry really is .
translation: Ceritanya ... sangat menginspirasi, ironis, dan mendedahkan betapa gilanya industri rakaman yang sangat berorientasikan wang.
back_translation: The story... is very inspiring, ironic, and exposes how crazy the money-oriented recording industry is.

text: hypnotically dull , relentlessly downbeat , laughably predictable wail pitched to the cadence of a depressed fifteen-year-old 's suicidal poetry .

text: every conceivable mistake a director could make in filming opera has been perpetrated here .

text: the film 's desire to be liked sometimes undermines the possibility for an exploration of the thornier aspects of the nature\/nurture argument in regards to homosexuality .
translation: Keinginan filem untuk disenangi kadang-kadang menghalang kemungkinan untuk meneroka aspek yang lebih rumit dalam hujah berkaitan dengan sifat bawaan dan persekitaran dalam konteks homosexuality.

text: with notorious c.h.o. cho proves she has the stuff to stand tall with pryor , carlin and murphy .

text: watching this film , one is left with the inescapable conclusion that hitchens ' obsession with kissinger is , at bottom , a sophisticated flower child 's desire to purge the world of the tooth and claw of human power .
translation: Menonton filem ini, seseorang dibiarkan dengan kesimpulan yang tidak dapat dielakkan bahawa kegilaan Hitchens terhadap Kissinger pada hakikatnya adalah keinginan seorang anak bunga yang sofistikated untuk membersihkan dunia daripada gigi dan cakar kuasa manusia.
back_translation: Watching this movie, one is left with the unavoidable conclusion that Hitchens' obsession with Kissinger is essentially a sophisticated flower child's desire to cleanse the world from the teeth and claws of human power.

text: e.t. works because its flabbergasting principals , 14-year-old robert macnaughton , 6-year-old drew barrymore and 10-year-old henry thomas , convince us of the existence of the wise , wizened visitor from a faraway planet .
translation: E.T. berjaya kerana pelakon utamanya yang menakjubkan, Robert MacNaughton berumur 14 tahun, Drew Barrymore berusia 6 tahun, dan Henry Thomas berusia 10 tahun, meyakinkan kita tentang kewujudan pelawat bijaksana dari planet yang jauh.
back_translation: E.T. succeeded because its main actors, the amazing Robert MacNaughton aged 14, Drew Barrymore aged 6, and Henry Thomas aged 10, convinced us of the existence of a wise visitor from a distant planet.

text: yes , it 's as good as you remember .
translation: Ya, memang sebaik yang kamu ingat.

text: this tale has been told and retold ; the races and rackets change , but the song remains the same .

text: a joyous occasion

text: -lrb- `` take care of my cat '' -rrb- is an honestly nice little film that takes us on an examination of young adult life in urban south korea through the hearts and minds of the five principals .

text: novak contemplates a heartland so overwhelmed by its lack of purpose that it seeks excitement in manufactured high drama .

text: one-of-a-kind near-masterpiece .

back_translation: Trying to delve into the laws of the universe of bears - when bears are bears and when they are like humans, just furrier - would trouble Einstein's brain.

text: a thoroughly engaging , surprisingly touching british comedy .

text: whether or not you buy mr. broomfield 's findings , the film acquires an undeniable entertainment value as the slight , pale mr. broomfield continues to force himself on people and into situations that would make lesser men run for cover .
translation: Sama ada anda mempercayai penemuan Encik Broomfield atau tidak, filem ini memiliki nilai hiburan yang tidak dapat disangkal ketika Encik Broomfield yang kecil dan pucat terus memaksa dirinya pada orang dan ke dalam situasi yang akan membuat lelaki yang kurang berani berlari mencari perlindungan.

text: for a story set at sea , ghost ship is pretty landbound , with its leaden acting , dull exposition and telegraphed ` surprises . '

text: an exit sign , that is .

translation: Ini adalah sebuah drama yang menawan, merendahkan diri, dan penuh dengan rasa kasih.

translation: Inilah filem jenayah yang keren yang sebenarnya berjaya membawa sesuatu yang baru ke dalam plot.

translation: Malangnya, kapur memodenkan cerita a.e.w. mason untuk sesuai dengan sensitiviti seorang remaja Amerika, satu keputusan yang memudarkan keaslian "the four feathers".

text: i am highly amused by the idea that we have come to a point in society where it has been deemed important enough to make a film in which someone has to be hired to portray richard dawson .

text: fessenden 's narrative is just as much about the ownership and redefinition of myth as it is about a domestic unit finding their way to joy .

text: skip the film and buy the philip glass soundtrack cd .

text: forages for audience sympathy like a temperamental child begging for attention , giving audiences no reason to truly care for its decrepit freaks beyond the promise of a reprieve from their incessant whining .
translation: Mencari simpati daripada penonton seperti seorang kanak-kanak yang temperamen meminta perhatian, memberikan penonton tiada sebab untuk benar-benar memikirkan freakus yang usang itu selain daripada janji untuk lega daripada keluhan mereka yang tidak berkesudahan.

text: unlike most anime , whose most ardent fans outside japan seem to be introverted young men with fantasy fetishes , metropolis never seems hopelessly juvenile .

text: there is something that is so meditative and lyrical about babak payami 's boldly quirky iranian drama secret ballot ... a charming and evoking little ditty that manages to show the gentle and humane side of middle eastern world politics
translation: Ada sesuatu yang begitu meditatif dan liris tentang drama Iran yang unik Babak Payami 'Secret Ballot... sebuah lagu kecil yang menawan dan membangkitkan perasaan yang berhasil menunjukkan sisi lembut dan berperikemanusiaan politik dunia Timur Tengah.

translation: Dengan atau tanpa seks, sebuah kisah cinta dan takdir yang indah, diceritakan dengan baik oleh seorang pengisah mahir.

translation: Tetapi ia juga boleh membuat anda menangis, dan ia akan berbuat demikian tanpa membuat anda berasa seperti ditipu.

text: the acting is just fine , but there 's not enough substance here to sustain interest for the full 90 minutes , especially with the weak payoff .

translation: Filem itu tidak mengekalkan janji permulaannya dengan nada baru yang mencemaskan, gaya seni baru menyerang pada separuh kedua.

text: to blandly go where we went 8 movies ago ...
translation: pergi dengan malas ke tempat yang kami pergi 8 filem yang lalu ...

text: the film 's lack of personality permeates all its aspects -- from the tv movie-esque , affected child acting to the dullest irish pub scenes ever filmed .
translation: Kelemahan filem ini meresap melalui semua aspeknya - dari lakonan kanak-kanak yang dipengaruhi filem TV hingga adegan pub Ireland yang paling hambar yang pernah dirakam.
back_translation: The weaknesses of this film permeate through all its aspects - from child-like acting influenced by TV movies to the most lackluster pub scene in Ireland ever recorded.

text: craig bartlett and director tuck tucker should be commended for illustrating the merits of fighting hard for something that really matters .

text: but it 's defiantly and delightfully against the grain .
translation: Tetapi ia pastinya dan dengan gembiranya melawan arus.

text: famuyiwa 's feature deals with its subject matter in a tasteful , intelligent manner , rather than forcing us to endure every plot contrivance that the cliché-riddled genre can offer .
translation: Tayangan ciri famuyiwa mengendalikan subjeknya dengan cara yang berbudi pekerti dan bijak, daripada memaksa kita untuk menanggung setiap plot kontrak yang boleh ditawarkan oleh genre yang penuh klise.

text: ` matrix ' - style massacres erupt throughout ... but the movie has a tougher time balancing its violence with kafka-inspired philosophy .
translation: Pembunuhan gaya 'The Matrix' merebak di seluruh ... tetapi filem ini menghadapi kesulitan untuk seimbang antara keganasan dengan falsafah terinspirasi oleh Kafka.

text: -lrb- toback 's -rrb- fondness for fancy split-screen , stuttering editing and pompous references to wittgenstein and kirkegaard ... blends uneasily with the titillating material .
translation: Kecenderungan kepada pengeditan skrin yang berpecah, penyuntingan yang tergagap, dan rujukan sombong kepada Wittgenstein dan Kierkegaard oleh Toback tidak sehalus dengan bahan yang mengasyikkan.
back_translation: Toback's tendency towards fragmented screen editing, stumbling editing, and arrogant referencing of Wittgenstein and Kierkegaard is not as refined as the engaging material.

text: at a time when commercialism has squeezed the life out of whatever idealism american moviemaking ever had , godfrey reggio 's career shines like a lonely beacon .
translation: Pada waktu yang komersialisasi telah memeras kehidupan daripada sebarang idealisme yang pernah ada dalam pembikinan filem Amerika, kerjaya Godfrey Reggio bersinar seperti mercu tanda yang kesepian.

text: the type of dumbed-down exercise in stereotypes that gives the -lrb- teen comedy -rrb- genre a bad name .

text: elegant and eloquent -lrb- meditation -rrb- on death and that most elusive of passions , love .
translation: keanggunan dan kefasihan (meditasi) tentang kematian dan kecintaan yang paling sukar difahami.

text: weird .

translation: Debut Clooney boleh dituduh sebagai sedikit tidak teratur, tetapi ia mempunyai gaya dan humor yang luar biasa, yang menunjukkan pengaruh pengarah-pengarah yang pernah mengarahkannya, terutamanya Coen Brothers dan Steven Soderbergh.

text: pair that with really poor comedic writing ... and you 've got a huge mess .

text: the audience when i saw this one was chuckling at all the wrong times , and that 's a bad sign when they 're supposed to be having a collective heart attack .
translation: Penonton ketawa pada waktu yang salah ketika saya menonton ini, dan itu adalah pertanda buruk apabila sepatutnya mereka semua sepatutnya merasakan serangan jantung secara bersama-sama.

text: nicholas nickleby celebrates the human spirit with such unrelenting dickensian decency that it turned me -lrb- horrors ! -rrb-
translation: Nicholas Nickleby merayakan semangat manusia dengan kesucian Dickensian yang tidak berbelah bahagi sehingga ia mempengaruhi saya -lrb- mengerikan! -rrb-

text: romanek 's themes are every bit as distinctive as his visuals .
translation: Tema-tema romanek sama uniknya dengan visualnya.

text: no worse a film than breaking out , and breaking out was utterly charming .

text: scooby doo is surely everything its fans are hoping it will be , and in that sense is a movie that deserves recommendation .
translation: Scooby-Doo pastinya adalah segala-galanya yang peminatnya harapkan, dan dalam konteks itu, filem tersebut sangat layak untuk disyorkan.
back_translation: Scooby-Doo is definitely everything its fans hope for, and in that context, the movie is highly recommended.

text: a dim-witted and lazy spin-off of the animal planet documentary series , crocodile hunter is entertainment opportunism at its most glaring .

Diterjemahkan dalam Bahasa Melayu:

text: queen of the damned as you might have guessed , makes sorry use of aaliyah in her one and only starring role -- she does little here but point at things that explode into flame .

back_translation: The cursed queen, as you may have guessed, did not utilize Aaliyah well in her solo leading role - she did almost nothing but display things that exploded into flames.

text: a loud , witless mess that has none of the charm and little of the intrigue from the tv series .

text: the problem with `` xxx '' is that its own action is n't very effective .

text: ` yes , that 's right : it 's forrest gump , angel of death . '

text: with a romantic comedy plotline straight from the ages , this cinderella story does n't have a single surprise up its sleeve .

text: ... while certainly clever in spots , this too-long , spoofy update of shakespeare 's macbeth does n't sustain a high enough level of invention .

text: no new plot conceptions or environmental changes , just different bodies for sharp objects to rip through .

text: australian actor\/director john polson and award-winning english cinematographer giles nuttgens make a terrific effort at disguising the obvious with energy and innovation .
translation: Pelakon/direktur Australia John Polson dan sinematografer berjaya dari England, Giles Nuttgens, berusaha dengan hebat untuk menyamarkan yang jelas dengan tenaga dan inovasi.

text: twohy knows how to inflate the mundane into the scarifying , and gets full mileage out of the rolling of a stray barrel or the unexpected blast of a phonograph record .
translation: Twohy tahu bagaimana untuk membesarkan perkara yang biasa menjadi menakutkan, dan mengambil kesempatan sepenuhnya dari gelora tong atau letupan tidak terduga dari rekod fonograf.
back_translation: Twohy knows how to amplify the ordinary into the frightening, and to take full advantage of the unexpected surge or burst of a phonograph record.

text: at once a testament to the divine calling of education and a demonstration of the painstaking process of imparting knowledge .
translation: sekali gus sebagai suatu bukti panggilan ilahi terhadap pendidikan dan sebagai tunjuk perasaan proses yang teliti dalam menyampaikan pengetahuan.

text: insufferably naive .

text: far too clever by half , howard 's film is really a series of strung-together moments , with all the spaces in between filled with fantasies , daydreams , memories and one fantastic visual trope after another .
translation: Terlalu pandai setengah mati, filem Howard sebenarnya adalah satu siri momen yang dirangka bersama, dengan segala ruang di antara diisi dengan fantasi, lamunan, kenangan dan satu trope visual yang fantastik selepas yang lain.

text: the director , mark pellington , does a terrific job conjuring up a sinister , menacing atmosphere though unfortunately all the story gives us is flashing red lights , a rattling noise , and a bump on the head .
translation: Pengarah, Mark Pellington, melakukan kerja yang hebat dalam mencipta atmosfera yang seram dan mengancam walaupun malangnya cerita hanya memberi kita lampu merah berkelip, bunyi gemeretak, dan tumbukan di kepala.

text: delivers more than its fair share of saucy hilarity .

text: i thought the relationships were wonderful , the comedy was funny , and the love ` real ' .

text: wickedly funny , visually engrossing , never boring , this movie challenges us to think about the ways we consume pop culture .
translation: Sangat lucu, memikat secara visual, tidak pernah membosankan, filem ini mencabar kita untuk memikirkan cara kita mengguna pakai budaya pop.

text: the spaniel-eyed jean reno infuses hubert with a mixture of deadpan cool , wry humor and just the measure of tenderness required to give this comic slugfest some heart .
translation: Jean Reno yang bertuhan anjing melongok memberi hubert dengan campuran keren tanpa ekspresi, humor ironis, dan sejumlah kelembutan yang diperlukan untuk memberikan sentuhan hati pada pertarungan komik ini.
back_translation: Jean Reno, who plays a dog-loving hitman, provides Hubert with a cool blend of expressionless demeanor, ironic humor, and just the right amount of tenderness needed to give a heartfelt touch to this comic battle.

text: a film with almost as many delights for adults as there are for children and dog lovers .
translation: Filem tersebut hampir sama menariknya untuk orang dewasa seperti untuk kanak-kanak dan peminat anjing.

text: a depraved , incoherent , instantly disposable piece of hackery .
translation: sebuah karya yang tercela, tidak konsisten, serta boleh dibuang dengan serta-merta.
back_translation: A reprehensible work, inconsistent, and can be discarded immediately.

text: the animation and game phenomenon that peaked about three years ago is actually dying a slow death , if the poor quality of pokemon 4 ever is any indication .
translation: fenomena animasi dan permainan yang mencapai kemuncaknya kira-kira tiga tahun yang lalu sekarang sebenarnya sedang merudum perlahan, jika kualiti yang teruk dalam Pokemon 4 Ever sebagai petanda.
back_translation: The phenomenon of animation and games that peaked about three years ago is actually slowly declining now, as seen in the poor quality of Pokemon 4 Ever.

text: the camera soars above the globe in dazzling panoramic shots that make the most of the large-screen format , before swooping down on a string of exotic locales , scooping the whole world up in a joyous communal festival of rhythm .
translation: Kamera melayang di atas dunia dalam adegan panoramik yang memukau yang memanfaatkan format skrin besar, sebelum turun ke rangkaian lokasi eksotik, mengambil seluruh dunia dalam festival komunal yang riang gembira irama.
back_translation: The camera levitates above the world in a stunning panoramic scene that exploits the widescreen format, before descending to a series of exotic locations, capturing the whole world in a joyous communal festival rhythm.

text: what 's really sad is to see two academy award winning actresses -lrb- and one academy award winning actor -rrb- succumb to appearing in this junk that 's tv sitcom material at best .
translation: Yang sangat sedih ialah melihat dua pelakon wanita pemenang Anugerah Akademi -lrb- dan seorang pelakon lelaki pemenang Anugerah Akademi -rrb- tunduk untuk muncul dalam filem sampah ini yang pada tahap terbaik hanya sepatutnya untuk sitkom TV.
back_translation: What is so sad is seeing two Academy Award-winning actresses -LRB- and one Academy Award-winning actor -RRB- stoop to appearing in this trashy film that at best should only be for a TV sitcom.

text: -lrb- jackson and bledel -rrb- seem to have been picked not for their acting chops , but for their looks and appeal to the pre-teen crowd .

text: whatever the movie 's sentimental , hypocritical lessons about sexism , its true colors come out in various wet t-shirt and shower scenes .
translation: Tidak kira apa pengajaran sentimenal dan hipokritik filem itu tentang seksisme, warna sebenarnya muncul dalam pelbagai adegan baju basah dan mandi.

back_translation: piercing feelings ... although clearly a manipulative film, it emerges as powerful rather than hurtful.

text: gussied up with so many distracting special effects and visual party tricks that it 's not clear whether we 're supposed to shriek or laugh .
translation: Dihias dengan begitu banyak kesan khas yang mengganggu dan tipu helah visual sehingga tidak jelas sama ada kita sepatutnya menjerit atau ketawa.

text: if only it had the story to match .

text: `` frailty '' has been written so well , that even a simple `` goddammit ! ''
translation: "kelemahan" telah ditulis dengan begitu baik, sehingga bahkan satu "goddammit!" yang mudah pun.

translation: Pianis ialah filem yang mungkin dilahirkan untuk dihasilkan oleh Roman Polanski.

text: the film has an infectious enthusiasm and we 're touched by the film 's conviction that all life centered on that place , that time and that sport .
translation: Filem ini mempunyai semangat yang menular dan kami tersentuh dengan keyakinan filem itu bahawa seluruh kehidupan tertumpu pada tempat itu, pada masa itu, dan pada sukan tersebut.
back_translation: This movie has an infectious spirit and we are touched by its conviction that all of life revolves around that place, at that time, and about that sport.

text: an excellent sequel .
translation: sebuah penjelasan yang sangat baik.

text: the trouble with making this queen a thoroughly modern maiden is that it also makes her appear foolish and shallow rather than , as was more likely , a victim of mental illness .
translation: Masalah apabila menjadikan ratu ini sebagai seorang gadis moden sepenuhnya adalah ia juga membuatnya kelihatan bodoh dan cetek daripada, sebagaimana lebih mungkin, sebagai mangsa penyakit mental.
back_translation: The problem of turning this queen into a fully modern girl is that it also makes her appear foolish and shallow rather than, as more likely, a victim of mental illness.

text: it 's a technically superb film , shining with all the usual spielberg flair , expertly utilizing the talents of his top-notch creative team .

text: the story really has no place to go since simone is not real -- she ca n't provide any conflict .

text: both a detective story and a romance spiced with the intrigue of academic skullduggery and politics .
translation: sama ada cerita detektif dan roman yang dipenuhi dengan intrik akademik dan politik.

translation: Semua sensualiti, semua erotisme dalam kisah vampir yang baik telah, maafkan perumpamaan ini, disedut keluar dan digantikan dengan kelucuan goth.

text: a quiet , disquieting triumph .
translation: sebuah kemenangan yang tenang, menggelisahkan.

translation: Mana-mana yang pernah memimpikan perjalanan ke angkasa tetapi tidak mampu membayar tiket $20 juta untuk menaiki roket Rusia seharusnya menonton tawaran imax ini.

text: -lrb- carvey 's -rrb- characters are both overplayed and exaggerated , but then again , subtlety has never been his trademark .
translation: Watak-watak Carvey adalah terlalu dimainkan dan dibesar-besarkan, tetapi pada masa yang sama, kehalusan tidak pernah menjadi tanda dagang beliau.

text: if divine secrets of the ya-ya sisterhood suffers from a ploddingly melodramatic structure , it comes to life in the performances .

text: rashomon-for-dipsticks tale .

text: sleek and arty .

text: the exploitative , clumsily staged violence overshadows everything , including most of the actors .

back_translation: The violence of exploitation, played out harshly surpasses everything, including most actors.

text: it takes a really long , slow and dreary time to dope out what tuck everlasting is about .
translation: Ia mengambil masa yang sangat lama, perlahan dan suram untuk menggauli apa itu tuck everlasting.

text: it 's splash without the jokes .
translation: Ia adalah "splash" tanpa jenaka.

text: even as it pays earnest homage to turntablists and beat jugglers , old schoolers and current innovators , scratch is great fun , full of the kind of energy it 's documenting .
translation: Walaupun ia memberi penghormatan ikhlas kepada turntablists dan beat jugglers, old schoolers dan inovator masa kini, scratch adalah sangat menyeronokkan, penuh dengan jenis tenaga yang ia sedang mendokumentasikan.

text: you begin to long for the end credits as the desert does for rain .

text: the problems and characters it reveals are universal and involving , and the film itself -- as well its delightful cast -- is so breezy , pretty and gifted , it really won my heart .

text: though filmed partly in canada , paid in full has clever ways of capturing inner-city life during the reagan years .
translation: Walaupun sebahagian daripada filem itu difilkan di Kanada, Paid in Full mempunyai cara yang bijak untuk menggambarkan kehidupan bandar dalam tempoh zaman Reagan.

text: not counting a few gross-out comedies i 've been trying to forget , this is the first film in a long time that made me want to bolt the theater in the first 10 minutes .
translation: Tidak termasuk beberapa komedi kasar yang cuba saya lupakan, ini adalah filem pertama dalam masa yang lama yang membuat saya mahu berlari keluar dari teater dalam 10 minit pertama.
back_translation: Excluding some crude comedies that I try to forget, this is the first movie in a long time that made me want to run out of the theater within the first 10 minutes.

text: all of the elements are in place for a great film noir , but director george hickenlooper 's approach to the material is too upbeat .
translation: Semua elemen diletakkan dengan sempurna untuk filem noir yang hebat, tetapi pendekatan pengarah George Hickenlooper terhadap bahan itu terlalu ceria.

text: the overall fabric is hypnotic , and mr. mattei fosters moments of spontaneous intimacy .

text: but , like silence , it 's a movie that gets under your skin .

text: gooding and coburn are both oscar winners , a fact which , as you watch them clumsily mugging their way through snow dogs , seems inconceivable .

back_translation: Gooding and Coburn are both Oscar winners, a fact that, when you see them acting carelessly in Snow Dogs, seems illogical.

back_translation: Although there is nothing new that we have not seen before from Murphy, i spy is still fun and enjoyable and so silly that it is more than worth the effort.

text: mctiernan 's remake may be lighter on its feet -- the sober-minded original was as graceful as a tap-dancing rhino -- but it is just as boring and as obvious .
translation: Remake oleh Mctiernan mungkin lebih ringan kerananya - versi asal yang serius berfikiran adalah sehalus badak menari tap - tetapi ia sama membosankan dan jelas.

text: while the importance of being earnest offers opportunities for occasional smiles and chuckles , it does n't give us a reason to be in the theater beyond wilde 's wit and the actors ' performances .

text: broomfield reminds us that beneath the hype , the celebrity , the high life , the conspiracies and the mystery there were once a couple of bright young men -- promising , talented , charismatic and tragically doomed .

text: but darned if it does n't also keep us riveted to our seats .

back_translation: But damn if it doesn't also make us stuck in our seats.

text: such an incomprehensible mess that it feels less like bad cinema than like being stuck in a dark pit having a nightmare about bad cinema .
translation: satu kekacauan yang sukar difahami sehingga terasa kurang seperti filem buruk daripada terasa seperti terperangkap dalam lobang gelap yang mempunyai mimpi buruk tentang filem buruk.
back_translation: a baffling chaos that feels more like a bad movie than being trapped in a dark hole having nightmares about bad movies.

text: there 's too much forced drama in this wildly uneven movie , about a young man 's battle with his inescapable past and uncertain future in a very shapable but largely unfulfilling present .
translation: Terlalu banyak drama yang dipaksakan dalam filem yang tidak seimbang ini, mengenai perjuangan seorang lelaki muda dengan masa lalunya yang tidak dapat dielakkan dan masa depan yang tidak pasti dalam kehadiran yang sangat berbentuk tetapi kebanyakannya tidak memuaskan.
back_translation: Too much forced drama in this unbalanced film, about the struggles of a young man with his unavoidable past and uncertain future in a very visually striking yet mostly unsatisfying presentation.

text: to call this film a lump of coal would only be to flatter it .
translation: Menggelar filem ini sebagai sebongkah arang hanya akan menjadi cara untuk memujinya.
back_translation: Calling this movie a piece of coal would only be a way to praise it.

text: all of the filmmakers ' calculations ca n't rescue brown sugar from the curse of blandness .
translation: Semua perhitungan pembuat filem tidak dapat menyelamatkan gula coklat daripada kutukan kebosanan.
back_translation: All the calculations of the filmmakers could not save the dark brown sugar from the curse of boredom.

text: intriguing and stylish .
translation: menarik dan bergaya.
back_translation: Interesting and stylish.

text: a few nonbelievers may rethink their attitudes when they see the joy the characters take in this creed , but skeptics are n't likely to enter the theater .

text: mostly , shafer and co-writer gregory hinton lack a strong-minded viewpoint , or a sense of humor .

text: it should be interesting , it should be poignant , it turns out to be affected and boring .

back_translation: It should be engaging, should touch the heart, but it ends up being influenced and boring.

text: when it 's not wallowing in hormonal melodrama , `` real women have curves '' is a sweet , honest , and enjoyable comedy-drama about a young woman who wants many things in life , but fears she 'll become her mother before she gets to fulfill her dreams .
translation: Apabila tidak tenggelam dalam melodrama hormon, "wanita sebenar mempunyai lengkung" adalah satu komedi-drama yang manis, jujur, dan menyeronokkan mengenai seorang wanita muda yang menginginkan banyak perkara dalam hidup, tetapi takut dia akan menjadi seperti ibunya sebelum dia berjaya mencapai impian-impiannya.
back_translation: Not drowning in the melodrama of hormones, "real women have curves" is a sweet, honest, and enjoyable comedy-drama about a young woman who desires many things in life but fears she will end up like her mother before she achieves her dreams.

text: cold , nervy and memorable .
translation: sejuk, gementar, dan tak akan dilupakan.
back_translation: cold, trembling, and unforgettable.

text: first-timer john mckay is never able to pull it back on course .
translation: Pemula John McKay tidak pernah dapat kembali ke landasan.
back_translation: Beginner John McKay never managed to return to the track.

text: you can practically hear george orwell turning over .
translation: Anda hampir boleh mendengar George Orwell berpusing.
back_translation: You can almost hear George Orwell spinning.

text: helmer hudlin tries to make a hip comedy , but his dependence on slapstick defeats the possibility of creating a more darkly edged tome .

text: passion , melodrama , sorrow , laugther , and tears cascade over the screen effortlessly ...

text: eric schweig and graham greene both exude an air of dignity that 's perfect for the proud warrior that still lingers in the souls of these characters .
translation: Eric Schweig dan Graham Greene kedua-duanya memancarkan aura martabat yang sempurna untuk prajurit bangga yang masih melekat dalam jiwa watak-watak ini.
back_translation: Eric Schweig and Graham Greene both emanate a perfect sense of dignity for the proud warriors that are deeply ingrained in the souls of these characters.

text: what jackson has done is proven that no amount of imagination , no creature , no fantasy story and no incredibly outlandish scenery
translation: Apa yang dilakukan oleh Jackson telah membuktikan bahawa tidak ada jumlah imaginasi, makhluk, cerita fantasi, dan pemandangan yang luar biasa pun
back_translation: What Jackson has done has proven that there is no limit to imagination, creatures, fantasy stories, and extraordinary landscapes.

text: there is n't one moment in the film that surprises or delights .

text: spiderman rocks
translation: Spiderman memang hebat.

text: astonishing is n't the word -- neither is incompetent , incoherent or just plain crap .

back_translation: Extraordinary is not an appropriate word - nor is incompetent, inconsistent, or just bad.

text: you might want to take a reality check before you pay the full ticket price to see `` simone , '' and consider a dvd rental instead .
translation: Anda mungkin perlu mengambil saringan realiti sebelum membayar harga penuh untuk melihat "Simone", dan pertimbangkan untuk menyewa DVD sebagai gantinya.

text: unfortunately , a cast of competent performers from movies , television and the theater are cast adrift in various new york city locations with no unifying rhythm or visual style .
translation: Malangnya, pelakon-pelakon yang kompeten dari filem, televisyen, dan pentas dilepaskan di pelbagai lokasi di bandar New York tanpa irama penyatuan atau gaya visual.

text: kids five and up will be delighted with the fast , funny , and even touching story .
translation: Kanak-kanak yang berumur lima tahun ke atas akan gembira dengan cerita yang pantas, lucu, dan menyentuh.

text: still , the updated dickensian sensibility of writer craig bartlett 's story is appealing .
translation: Namun, kepekaan bergaya zaman Dickens yang dikemaskinikan dalam cerita penulis Craig Bartlett tetap menarik.
back_translation: However, the updated Dickensian-style sensitivity in writer Craig Bartlett's story remains engaging.

text: waydowntown manages to nail the spirit-crushing ennui of denuded urban living without giving in to it .
translation: Waydowntown berjaya menggambarkan kebosanan yang menghancurkan semangat kehidupan bandar yang dibiarkan kosong tanpa menyerah padanya.

text: he watches them as they float within the seas of their personalities .

text: hard as this may be to believe , here on earth , a surprisingly similar teen drama , was a better film .

text: it 's a funny little movie with clever dialogue and likeable characters .
translation: Ini adalah filem kecil yang lucu dengan dialog pintar dan watak yang disukai.

text: it 's pretty linear and only makeup-deep , but bogdanovich ties it together with efficiency and an affection for the period .

text: adaptation is simply brilliant .

text: a thought-provoking picture .
translation: sebuah gambar yang merangsang pemikiran.

text: director charles stone iii applies more detail to the film 's music than to the story line ; what 's best about drumline is its energy .

text: presents nothing special and , until the final act , nothing overtly disagreeable .

translation: Turturro sangat lucu dan berlebihan sebagai seorang 'pelayan yang sangat licik' yang terampil dalam seni aksi menghilang\/muncul yang mustahil.

text: average , at best , i 'm afraid .

translation: Saya merasa terperangkap tanpa sebarang jalan keluar yang jelas untuk keseluruhan 100 minit.

text: anemic , pretentious .

translation: Memiliki semua ciri-ciri filem yang direka khas untuk video rumah kanak-kanak, pasaran yang sangat lapar sehingga menyerap segala jenis hiburan yang membosankan, selagi kanak-kanak berumur 3 tahun merasa terhibur.

translation: ...tidak punya elemen asal, atau pun berkesan, tetapi sebagai hiburan ringan untuk hari Sabtu petang di bandar, ia tidak mengecewakan.

text: the 50-something lovebirds are too immature and unappealing to care about .
translation: Pasangan kekasih yang berusia 50-an terlalu tidak matang dan tidak menarik untuk diambil peduli.

text: after a while , the only way for a reasonably intelligent person to get through the country bears is to ponder how a whole segment of pop-music history has been allowed to get wet , fuzzy and sticky .
translation: Selepas beberapa masa, satu-satunya cara bagi seseorang yang cukup bijak untuk melalui kerumunan beruang di negara itu adalah dengan merenung bagaimana satu segmen sejarah muzik pop telah dibiarkan basah, kabur, dan melekit.
back_translation: After some time, the only way for a wise person to navigate through the crowd of bears in the country is to ponder on how a segment of pop music history has been left wet, blurry, and sticky.

text: a lot of fun , with an undeniable energy sparked by two actresses in their 50s working at the peak of their powers .
translation: Banyak keseronokan, dengan tenaga yang tidak dapat dinafikan yang dikembuhkan oleh dua pelakon wanita berusia 50-an yang berkerja pada puncak kuasa mereka.

text: a breathtaking adventure for all ages , spirit tells its poignant and uplifting story in a stunning fusion of music and images .

text: this is a nicely handled affair , a film about human darkness but etched with a light -lrb- yet unsentimental -rrb- touch .
translation: Ini adalah satu hal yang diurus dengan baik, filem tentang kegelapan manusia tetapi dicetuskan dengan sentuhan yang ringan (tetapi tidak sentimental).

text: a bland animated sequel that hardly seems worth the effort .
translation: sekuel animasi yang hambar yang hampir tidak berbaloi untuk diusahakan.

text: unspeakable , of course , barely begins to describe the plot and its complications .

text: it 's ... worth the extra effort to see an artist , still committed to growth in his ninth decade , change while remaining true to his principles with a film whose very subject is , quite pointedly , about the peril of such efforts .
translation: Ia layak untuk memberi usaha ekstra untuk melihat seorang seniman, masih komited untuk pertumbuhan di dekad kesembilannya, berubah sambil tetap setia kepada prinsip-prinsipnya dengan filem yang subjeknya adalah tentang bahaya usaha-usaha sedemikian.

text: in auteil 's less dramatic but equally incisive performance , he 's a charismatic charmer likely to seduce and conquer .
translation: Dalam lakonan yang kurang dramatik tetapi sama tajam oleh auteil, beliau merupakan pesona yang karismatik yang mungkin merayu dan menakluki.

text: how many more times will indie filmmakers subject us to boring , self-important stories of how horrible we are to ourselves and each other ?

text: this is a movie that refreshes the mind and spirit along with the body , so original is its content , look , and style .

text: a much better documentary -- more revealing , more emotional and more surprising -- than its pedestrian english title would have you believe .
translation: Sebuah dokumentari yang jauh lebih baik - lebih mendedahkan, lebih emosional dan lebih mengejutkan - daripada judul Inggerisnya yang biasa.
back_translation: A documentary that is much better - more revealing, more emotional, and more surprising - than its usual English title.

text: ` if you are in the mood for an intelligent weepy , it can easily worm its way into your heart . '
translation: Jika anda berada dalam mood untuk sebuah filem sedih yang bijak, filem ini mudah memujuk hati anda.
back_translation: If you are in the mood for a poignant yet wise film, this film easily captivates your heart.

text: who knows , but it works under the direction of kevin reynolds .
translation: Siapa tahu, tetapi ia berfungsi di bawah arahan Kevin Reynolds.
back_translation: Who knows, but it operates under Kevin Reynolds' direction.

text: it 's supposed to be post-feminist breezy but ends up as tedious as the chatter of parrots raised on oprah .
translation: Ia sepatutnya bersifat santai pasca-feminis tetapi berakhir menjadi membosankan seperti perbualan burung beo yang dibesarkan di oprah.
back_translation: It should be casually post-feminist but ended up being as boring as a conversation of a parrot raised on Oprah.

text: lacking substance and soul , crossroads comes up shorter than britney 's cutoffs .
translation: Kurang bahan dan jiwa, persimpangan jalan ini lebih pendek daripada potongan seluar Britney.
back_translation: Lacking material and soul, this intersection is shorter than Britney's shorts.

text: simple , poignant and leavened with humor , it 's a film that affirms the nourishing aspects of love and companionship .
translation: Filem itu ringkas, menyentuh, dan diperkayakan dengan humor, ia merupakan filem yang menegaskan aspek pemakanan cinta dan kebersamaan.
back_translation: The film is short, touching, and enriched with humor, it is a film that emphasizes the aspects of nourishing love and togetherness.

text: at times , the movie looks genuinely pretty .
translation: Terkadang, filem itu nampak amat cantik.
back_translation: Sometimes, the movie looks very beautiful.

text: a deliberative account of a lifestyle characterized by its surface-obsession -- one that typifies the delirium of post , pre , and extant stardom .
translation: sebuah akaun deliberatif tentang gaya hidup yang dicirikan oleh obsesi terhadap permukaannya - satu yang mencirikan kegilaan pasca, pra, dan ketenaran yang masih ada.
back_translation: A deliberative account of a lifestyle characterized by an obsession with its surface - one that embodies the madness of past, present, and enduring fame.

text: this is surely one of the most frantic , virulent and foul-natured christmas season pics ever delivered by a hollywood studio .
translation: Ini pasti salah satu imej musim Krismas yang paling hebat, berbahaya, dan jahat yang pernah dihasilkan oleh sebuah studio Hollywood.
back_translation: This is definitely one of the most spectacular, dangerous, and evil Christmas season images ever produced by a Hollywood studio.

text: i simply ca n't recommend it enough .
translation: Saya benar-benar tidak dapat memberikannya cukup penilaian yang baik.
back_translation: I really can't give it enough credit.

text: it 's a glorified sitcom , and a long , unfunny one at that .
translation: Ini adalah sebuah komedi situasi yang dipuja-puji, dan juga panjang, tanpa lawak sama sekali.
back_translation: This is a praised situation comedy, long, without any humor at all.

text: returning director rob minkoff ... and screenwriter bruce joel rubin ... have done a fine job of updating white 's dry wit to a new age .
translation: Pengarah yang kembali, Rob Minkoff ... dan penulis skrip Bruce Joel Rubin ... telah melakukan tugas yang baik dalam mengemaskini kecerdasan kering White ke zaman baru.
back_translation: Returning director, Rob Minkoff... and scriptwriter Bruce Joel Rubin... have done a good job in updating the dry wit of White to the new era.

text: with zoe clarke-williams 's lackluster thriller `` new best friend '' , who needs enemies ?
translation: Dengan filem seram yang kurang bertenaga oleh Zoe Clarke-Williams, "New Best Friend", siapa yang memerlukan musuh?
back_translation: With a lackluster horror film by Zoe Clarke-Williams, "New Best Friend", who needs enemies?

text: just send it to cranky .
translation: Hantarnya kepada cranky sahaja.
back_translation: Send it to cranky only.

text: it 's secondary to american psycho but still has claws enough to get inside you and stay there for a couple of hours .
translation: Ia adalah sekunder berbanding American Psycho tetapi masih cukup tajam untuk meresap ke dalam diri anda dan kekal di sana untuk beberapa jam.
back_translation: It's secondary compared to American Psycho but still sharp enough to seep into you and linger there for a few hours.

text: one of the funnier movies in town .
translation: Salah satu filem yang lebih lucu di bandar.
back_translation: One of the funniest movies in town.

text: a terrific insider look at the star-making machinery of tinseltown .
translation: sorotan dalaman yang hebat tentang mesin pembuat bintang di dunia hiburan.
back_translation: A great insight into the star-making machine in the entertainment world.

text: the movie is amateurish , but it 's a minor treat .
translation: Filem tersebut amat amatur, tetapi ia merupakan satu hiburan minor.
back_translation: The film is very amateurish, but it is a minor entertainment.

text: it is n't scary .
translation: Ia tidak menakutkan.
back_translation: It's not scary.

text: a preposterous , prurient whodunit .
translation: satu cerita seram yang tidak masuk akal, dan berunsur mesra nafsu.
back_translation: a nonsensical horror story with elements of sensual desire.

text: they are what makes it worth the trip to the theatre .
translation: Mereka lah yang membuat lawatan ke teater menjadi berbaloi.
back_translation: They are the ones who make a visit to the theater worthwhile.

text: chan 's stunts are limited and so embellished by editing that there 's really not much of a sense of action or even action-comedy .
translation: Aksi Chan terhad dan sangat dihiasi oleh penyuntingan sehingga sebenarnya tidak banyak rasa aksi atau komedi aksi.
back_translation: Chan's actions are limited and heavily embellished by editing so there isn't actually much action or action comedy.

text: an average kid-empowerment fantasy with slightly above-average brains .
translation: fantasi pemberdayaan kanak-kanak yang sederhana dengan kepandaian sedikit di atas paras purata.
back_translation: Fantasy of empowering children with slightly above-average intelligence.

text: instead of making his own style , director marcus adams just copies from various sources -- good sources , bad mixture
translation: Daripada mencipta gaya sendiri, pengarah Marcus Adams hanya meniru dari pelbagai sumber -- sumber yang baik, campuran yang tidak baik.
back_translation: Instead of creating his own style, director Marcus Adams only imitated from various sources -- both good sources and not-so-good mixes.

text: the plot of the comeback curlers is n't very interesting actually , but what i like about men with brooms and what is kind of special is how the film knows what 's unique and quirky about canadians .
translation: Jalan cerita The Comeback Curlers sebenarnya tidak begitu menarik, tetapi yang saya suka tentang Men with Brooms dan yang agak istimewa adalah bagaimana filem ini tahu apa yang unik dan aneh tentang orang Kanada.
back_translation: The storyline of The Comeback Curlers is actually not very interesting, but what I like about Men with Brooms and what is somewhat special is how the movie knows what is unique and peculiar about Canadians.

text: tambor and clayburgh make an appealing couple -- he 's understated and sardonic , she 's appealingly manic and energetic .
translation: Tambor dan Clayburgh menjadi sepasang pasangan yang menarik - dia pendiam dan sinis, manakala dia penuh gairah dan energetik.
back_translation: Tambor and Clayburgh make an interesting pair - he is quiet and sardonic, while she is passionate and energetic.

text: the movie is without intent .
translation: Filem ini tidak mempunyai tujuan.
back_translation: This movie has no purpose.

text: the best thing about the movie is its personable , amusing cast .
translation: Yang terbaik tentang filem itu adalah pelakonnya yang ramah dan menghiburkan.
back_translation: The best thing about the movie is its friendly and entertaining actors.

text: here is a divine monument to a single man 's struggle to regain his life , his dignity and his music .
translation: Inilah monumen ilahi kepada perjuangan seorang lelaki untuk mendapatkan kembali kehidupannya, maruahnya, dan muziknya.
back_translation: This is a divine monument to a man's struggle to regain his life, dignity, and music.

text: if you 're the kind of parent who enjoys intentionally introducing your kids to films which will cause loads of irreparable damage that years and years of costly analysis could never fix , i have just one word for you - -- decasia
translation: Jika anda adalah jenis ibu bapa yang suka sengaja memperkenalkan anak-anak anda kepada filem-filem yang akan menyebabkan banyak kerosakan yang tidak dapat diperbaiki selama bertahun-tahun meskipun melalui analisis yang mahal, saya hanya ada satu perkataan untuk anda - -- decasia
back_translation: If you are the kind of parent who intentionally likes to expose your children to films that will cause a lot of irreparable damage for years to come despite expensive analysis, I have only one word for you - decasia.

text: all movie long , city by the sea swings from one approach to the other , but in the end , it stays in formula -- which is a waste of de niro , mcdormand and the other good actors in the cast .
translation: Sepanjang filem, City by the Sea berubah pendekatan dari satu ke yang lain, tetapi pada akhirnya, ia kekal dalam formula - yang merupakan pembaziran kepada De Niro, McDormand dan pelakon-pelakon lain yang baik dalam watak.
back_translation: Throughout the film, City by the Sea changes its approach from one to another, but ultimately, it remains within the formula - which is a waste for De Niro, McDormand, and other good actors in their roles.

text: painful , horrifying and oppressively tragic , this film should not be missed .
translation: Menyayat hati, menakutkan, dan tragis dengan terasa sangat menyakitkan, filem ini tidak boleh dilepaskan.
back_translation: Heart-wrenching, scary, and tragic with a painfully felt intenseness, this film is unmissable.

text: take care is nicely performed by a quintet of actresses , but nonetheless it drags during its 112-minute length .
translation: "Take care" dilakonkan dengan baik oleh kuintet pelakon wanita, tetapi ia tetap lambat semasa jangka masa 112 minit.
back_translation: "Take care" was performed well by the quintet of female actors, but it still feels slow during the 112-minute duration.

text: the script covers huge , heavy topics in a bland , surfacey way that does n't offer any insight into why , for instance , good things happen to bad people .
translation: Skrip merangkumi topik-topik besar, berat dalam cara yang hambar, permukaan yang tidak memberikan sebarang pandangan mengenai mengapa, contohnya, perkara baik berlaku kepada orang jahat.
back_translation: The script covers major, weighty topics in a bland manner, with a surface that does not provide any insight into why, for example, good things happen to bad people.

text: a seriously bad film with seriously warped logic by writer-director kurt wimmer at the screenplay level .
translation: Filem yang sangat buruk dengan logik yang sangat berbelit-belit oleh penulis-pengarah Kurt Wimmer di peringkat skrip.
back_translation: A very bad movie with convoluted logic by writer-director Kurt Wimmer at the script level.

text: a deliciously nonsensical comedy about a city coming apart at its seams .
translation: Sebuah komedi yang sangat tidak masuk akal tentang sebuah bandar yang berada dalam keadaan kacau.
back_translation: A highly illogical comedy about a city in chaos.
